title: Welsh MP accused of 'refusing' to get behind Rishi Sunak's general election campaign in leaked memo
creator: newsdesk@walesonline.co.uk (Ruth Mosalski)
description: A leaked email names the Wrexham MP Sarah Atherton as one of those not 'getting behind' the election on July 4
content: Conservative ministers and MPs are failing to "get behind" general election campaigning, a leaked memo from Tory headquarters sent days into the campaign has revealed. Rishi Sunak shocked the nation, and many of his party colleagues and supporters, by announcing the election would take place on July 4. It has reportedly led to consternation within the ranks with some candidates still to be selected. In Wales, there are still not candidates for every seat with less than six weeks to go to the election. The Conservatives have selected a number of seats as their priorities for the campaign. They are the Vale of Glamorgan, where Alun Cairns is MP; Ynys Mon, represented by Virginia Crosbie since the last election; Mid and south Pembrokeshire where Stephen Crabb is the candidate and Wrexham , where Sarah Atherton has been MP since 2019. For the latest Welsh news delivered to your inbox sign up to our newsletter READ MORE: The people in the running to replace Huw Edwards for the BBC's general election coverage READ MORE: How to vote in the General Election - deadline for registering and how to get a postal vote The memo had two attachments. One was a constituency breakdown with what appeared to be sanitised comments. The other had the unvarnished thoughts of Conservative staff. The email was later recalled. The "key theme" identified in the document was that candidates had failed to “get behind” the campaign, with some on holiday or refusing to knock on doors. The email, reported by The Times , said Sarah Atherton, the MP for Wrexham, was accused of “refusing to engage” in the note, which said: “Wants to cancel this week’s campaigning sessions and stop CM [campaign manager] from running pre-scheduled campaigning sessions over weekend.” Ms Atherton, who shared a picture of herself on the campaign trail in Gwersyllt on May 24, has been contacted for comment. Her colleague Craig Williams, who represents Montgomeryshire, said on BBC Radio Wales: "These internal memos come out from all parties all the time. I know Sarah, she is a class act and has been a terrific MP for Wrexham. I know for a fact, because I'm going up there to help her, that she's campaigning every single day. Whether she's engaging with one person or another person, I think that's immaterial." Join our General Election WhatsApp community by clicking on this link , and selecting 'Join Community'. No one else will be able to see your personal information and you’ll only receive messages from WalesOnline’s team. You will receive updates from us daily and through the night on July 4.

title: INTERVIEW: Oman’s Most Trusted Brand – Dana Eggs
creator: Anirban
description: Dana Eggs: Building consumer trust through high-quality, hygienic eggs Muscat – Arabian Food Production Company’s (AFPC Group) flagship brand, Dana Eggs, won Oman’s Most Trusted Brand Award 2023 in the Poultry Products (Eggs) Category. Renowned for its high-quality and hygienic eggs, Dana has set the standard in Oman’s fresh eggs market as one of the [...]
content: Arabian Food Production Company’s (AFPC Group) flagship brand, Dana Eggs, won Oman’s Most Trusted Brand Award 2023 in the Poultry Products (Eggs) Category. Renowned for its high-quality and hygienic eggs, Dana has set the standard in Oman’s fresh eggs market as one of the leading egg brands. In an interview with , Dr Suheel Ahmed, Group CEO of Arabian Food Production Company, discusses AFPC Group’s strategies that have positioned Dana as a market leader, emphasising their commitment to quality, safety, hygiene, and consumer trust and satisfaction. He also shares insights on AFPC Group’s innovative and sustainable practices that have solidified Dana’s leadership in the industry. Winning Oman’s Most Trusted Brand Award in the poultry products (eggs) category is a significant achievement for Dana brand and AFPC Group. It reflects our commitment to quality, food safety, and customer satisfaction. This accolade enhances our brand’s reputation, validates the hard work of our team, and strengthens our relationship with consumers. We are motivated to continue delivering superior poultry products and maintaining the trust placed in us by our customers. AFPC Group has positioned itself as the leading producer of fresh eggs in Oman by investing in advanced technology, implementing strict quality control measures, and understanding customer needs. Since our establishment, we have ensured optimal conditions for our hens and adhered to international standards to produce high-quality, hygienic eggs. Our dedication to innovation, rigorous biosecurity measures, and a robust distribution network ensures we deliver fresh and nutritious eggs daily. Additionally, we prioritise environmental protection by using the latest machinery to manage organic wastes and employing energy-efficient machinery and lights throughout our facilities. This commitment to sustainability further enhances our operations and product quality. Dana stands apart from other egg brands in Oman due to our unwavering commitment to quality, freshness, and food safety. We prioritise the health and well-being of our hens, employ state-of-the-art production techniques, and adhere to strict hygiene standards. Our chickens are fed a vegetarian, plant-based diet, which enhances the taste and nutritional quality of our eggs. Customers trust Dana because they know they are getting consistently high-quality, nutritious, and safe eggs. Our transparency, reliability, and dedication to customer satisfaction further reinforce this trust and set us apart in the market. Dana maintains the safety, quality, and hygiene of its eggs through a comprehensive approach that encompasses every stage of production and distribution. We start with raising our hens in optimal, bio-secure environments to ensure their health and productivity. Our facilities use advanced technology (ISE Japanese Model) and adhere to stringent international standards for cleanliness and safety. Throughout the production process, we conduct regular quality checks and health screenings. Our eggs are carefully cleaned, inspected, and packaged in sanitised conditions to prevent contamination. We also utilise a robust cold chain logistics system to maintain the freshness and quality of our eggs during transportation. By implementing rigorous quality control measures and continuously monitoring each step from farm to store, Dana ensures that our customers receive only the safest, highest-quality eggs. AFPC Group ensures its eggs meet nutritional needs and preferences by: providing hens with a balanced diet; implementing strict quality controls; offering diverse egg options; providing transparent nutritional information on packaging; and providing attractive and secure tamper proof packing. Dana currently commands a notable market share in Oman’s fresh eggs market. To further expand our presence in Oman and across the GCC, we are implementing strategic initiatives. This includes targeted marketing campaigns to bolster brand recognition, introducing innovative egg products tailored to consumer preferences, and enhancing our distribution network for wider accessibility. Additionally, we prioritise fostering customer loyalty by consistently delivering high-quality eggs and exceptional service. These efforts collectively through management team of highly qualified professionals aiming to solidify Dana’s position as a leader in the fresh eggs market regionally. The significance of AFPC Group’s vision to make Oman self-sufficient in farm-fresh table eggs is multifaceted. Firstly, achieving self-sufficiency in egg production reduces dependence on imports, contributing to Oman’s food security and economic stability. Secondly, it promotes domestic agriculture and supports local farmers, fostering economic growth and rural development. Thirdly, producing farm-fresh table eggs locally ensures consumers have access to high-quality, nutritious eggs, positively impacting public health and well-being. Overall, AFPC Group’s vision aligns with national priorities of sustainability, economic diversification, and enhancing food self-reliance, making it a significant endeavour for Oman’s agricultural sector and the nation. Certainly. AFPC Group’s strategy for promoting Omanisation and increasing Omani employment involves active recruitment of Omani nationals, comprehensive training programmes, partnerships with educational institutions, internal career development opportunities, and fostering a supportive work environment. These initiatives aim to empower Omani talent, contribute to national development, and drive the growth of our organisation. AFPC Group ensures that its eggs are accessible to customers throughout Oman through a comprehensive distribution network. We have established partnerships with retailers, supermarkets, and other distribution channels across the country to make our products readily available to consumers in urban and rural areas alike. To ensure affordability without compromising on quality, AFPC Group implements several strategies: Efficient production practices: We optimise our production processes to minimise costs while maintaining high standards of quality and safety. Economies of scale: As one of the leading egg producers in Oman, we benefit from economies of scale, allowing us to reduce production costs and offer competitive prices to customers. Supply chain management: We streamline our supply chain to minimise overheads and transportation costs, enabling us to pass on savings to customers. Market positioning: While ensuring affordability, we also focus on providing value to customers by offering high-quality eggs that meet their nutritional needs and preferences. By balancing accessibility, affordability, and quality, AFPC Group ensures that our eggs are accessible to all segments of the population without compromising on our commitment to excellence. AFPC Group maintains the quality and freshness of its eggs during transportation and storage through meticulous attention to detail and adherence to best practices: Cold chain management: We utilise refrigerated vehicles and storage facilities to maintain optimal temperature conditions throughout the transportation and storage process, ensuring that the eggs remain fresh. Quality packaging: Our eggs are carefully packaged in sturdy containers that protect them from damage during transit and storage, preserving their quality and freshness. Timely delivery: We prioritise efficient logistics and scheduling to minimise transit times and ensure that eggs reach their destinations promptly, minimising the risk of spoilage. Regular monitoring: We conduct regular inspections and quality checks throughout the transportation and storage process to detect any issues early and take corrective action as needed. Hygiene practices: We maintain strict hygiene standards during transportation and storage to prevent contamination and ensure the safety and quality of our eggs. By implementing these measures, AFPC Group ensures that our eggs reach customers in Oman and beyond in optimal condition, guaranteeing freshness and quality. In Oman, poultry farms face various challenges, including: Climate conditions: Oman’s hot climate can pose challenges for poultry farming, impacting bird health and productivity. Disease control: Disease outbreaks pose a significant risk to poultry farms, requiring robust biosecurity measures and vaccination programs. Market competition: Competition from imported poultry products can impact local poultry farms’ market share and profitability. To overcome these challenges, AFPC Group implements several strategies. We invest in advanced technology and infrastructure to mitigate the impact of climate conditions and optimise production efficiency. We have stringent biosecurity protocols in place to prevent disease outbreaks and ensure the health and welfare of our birds. We maintain high standards of quality and safety in our products to differentiate ourselves from imported poultry products and retain customer trust. By proactively addressing these challenges, AFPC Group remains resilient and continues to thrive in Oman’s poultry industry.

title: Seck, prestito fallimentare al Frosinone: ora Vagnati dovrà cercare di cederlo
creator: Fabio Gallo
description: Demba Seck ha giocato la seconda parte di stagione al Frosinone: per lui [...]
content: La stagione di Demba Seck , giocatore classe 2001 di proprietà del Torino, non poteva andare peggio di così. A gennaio era stato mandato in prestito al Frosinone di Di Francesco. I ciociari domenica sera, sono retrocessi in Serie B, mentre è stato l’Empoli di Nicola a salvarsi. Prestito fallimentare per lui al Frosinone. Ha giocato poco e la storia è sempre la stessa: 0 gol e 0 assist. In Europa, nei top 5 campionati europei, è uno degli attaccanti che non ha segnato nemmeno 1 gol in stagione, ma con non pochi minuti giocati tra Torino e Frosinone. Inoltre, non ha giocato la Coppa d’Africa con il Senegal e le vicende extracampo lo hanno di certo condizionato. Ora farà rientro al Torino: Vagnati dovrà cercare di cederlo. Si trattava infatti di un prestito secco. Arrivato a metà stagione, ha preso il numero 8. 11 partite giocate per lui, ma solo le prime 3 da titolare. Le ultime 5, decisive per la salvezza, le ha passate in panchina (le ultime 2 in tribuna per la precisione). 0 gol e 0 assist. Contro il Napoli al Maradona (partita finita 2-2), ha sbagliato un gol a porta vuota clamoroso. Se si contano anche le presenze al Toro, quest’anno in Serie A ne ha fatte 20. Al suo arrivo il ds del Frosinone Angelozzi era molto contento. Aveva parlato di un giocatore fantastico, che poteva fare sia la punta che l’attaccante esterno. “Più di un giocatore con un solo giocatore” , aveva detto. Ora Vagnati dovrà cercare di cederlo. A prescindere da chi arriverà come nuovo allenatore, sembra finita l’era di Seck al Torino. Arrivato nella stagione 2021/2022 dalla Spal, non ha mai fatto 1 gol o fornito 1 assist in Serie A. Le vicende fuori dal campo non sono piaciute ai tifosi del Toro. La società non ha mai preso una posizione, ma quello che è successo è grave, molto grave. Il suo contratto scade nel 2025. Quest’anno si è parlato di lui più per quello che ha combinato fuori dal campo, pensare che doveva essere il sostituto di Miranchuk... Vagnati cerchi una sistemazione, al più presto.

title: How failed spy satellite launch works in North Korea's favour: 'Tried new fuel'
description: North Korea's military satellite launch fails, rocket explodes in Yellow Sea. Analysts suspect Russian assistance in new engine type.

title: “எனக்கு ‘ஏடிஹெச்டி’ குறைபாடு உள்ளது” - ஃபஹத் ஃபாசில் பகிர்வு
creator: செய்திப்பிரிவு
description: “ஏடிஹெச்டி என்ற நோயால் பாதிக்கப்பட்டுள்ளேன். 41 வயதில் இந்த நோயை குணப்படுத்த முடியுமா என்று மருத்துவரிடம் கேட்டேன். அவர் சிறுவயதில் இந்நோயை கண்டறிந்தால் உடனே குணப்படுத்திவிடலாம் என்றார்” என மலையாள நடிகர் ஃபஹத் ஃபாசில் தெரிவித்துள்ளார்.
content: சென்னை: “ஏடிஹெச்டி என்ற நோயால் பாதிக்கப்பட்டுள்ளேன். 41 வயதில் இந்த நோயை குணப்படுத்த முடியுமா என்று மருத்துவரிடம் கேட்டேன். அவர் சிறுவயதில் இந்நோயை கண்டறிந்தால் உடனே குணப்படுத்திவிடலாம் என்றார்” என நடிகர் ஃபஹத் ஃபாசில் தெரிவித்துள்ளார். கேரளாவின் எர்ணாகுளம் பகுதியின் கோதமங்கலம் அருகே உள்ள கிராமத்தில் மாற்றுத்திறனாளி குழந்தைகள் காப்பகத்துக்கு வருகை புரிந்தார் நடிகர் ஃபஹத் பாசில். அங்கு பேசிய அவர், “எனக்கு மருத்துவ ரீதியாக ஏடிஹெச்டி என்ற குறைபாடு கண்டறியப்பட்டுள்ளது. அது பெரிய பிரச்சினை இல்லை என்றாலும், அதற்கென்று தனி குணாதிசயங்கள் உண்டு. நான் மருத்துவரிடம் 41 வயதில் இந்த நோயை குணப்படுத்த முடியுமா என்று கேட்டேன். அதற்கு அவர், சிறுவயதாக இருந்தால் இந்த நோயை உடனே குணப்படுத்தி விடலாம் என்றார்” எனப் பேசினார். ஃபஹத்தின் இந்த பேச்சால் ரசிகர்கள் அதிர்ச்சியடைந்துள்ளனர். மேலும் அவர் பேசிய வீடியோ சமூக வலைதளங்களில் வைரலாகி வருகிறது. ஏடிஹெச்டி (ADHD): ‘Attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder’ என்பது மூளையின் செயல்பாடுகளை கட்டுப்படுத்தும் நரம்பியல் குறைபாடு என மருத்துவர்களால் விளக்கப்படுகிறது. கவனச்சிதறல் குறைபாடு என்பது இதன் எளிய விளக்கம். இந்த நோயால் பாதிக்கப்பட்டவர்கள், கவனச் சிதறல் காரணமாக குறிப்பிட்ட வேலையை அதற்கு உண்டான காலத்துக்குள் முடிக்க முடியாமல் தவிப்பது உண்டு. ஹைபர் ஆக்டிவாக இருப்பது, கவனச்சிதறல், உணர்ச்சிகளை அடக்க முடியாமை, வேலையில் கவனம் செலுத்த முடியாமை, அதிகமாக பேசிக்கொண்டேயிருப்பது உள்ளிட்டவை இந்நோயின் அறிகுறிகளாக குறிப்பிடப்படுகின்றன. நடிகர் ஃபஹத் ஃபாசில் தனக்கு இந்த நோய் இருப்பதாக தெரிவித்திருப்பதன் மூலம் இந்நோய் தொடர்பான விழிப்புணர்வு ஏற்பட்டுள்ளது. #FahadhFaasil reveals that he was diagnosed with ADHD (Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder) at the age of 41. #Aavesham pic.twitter.com/IWFrTwqfmW

title: Lots in store as Chirk Carnival returns this weekend
description: The popular event takes place this Saturday and there will be lots to enjoy
content: The event takes place on Saturday (June 1) at Chirk Recreational Ground - starting at 10am. There will be live music and stunt shows, as well as an Artisan Market, street food, an onsite bar, a fairground, and more. Tickets can be bought via - with advanced ticket offers until Thursday (May 30). Your ticket includes loads of free activities for the whole family, so you can enjoy an action-packed day in the beautiful surroundings of Chirk Recreational Ground. Street food will also cater to vegan/vegetarian and gluten-free diets. There is a large undercover area, so whatever the weather, you can enjoy the carnival music, which will be back-to-back until 7pm. The event is being organised by Fair Event Management Ltd - which also runs the Wrexham Feast and Artisan Market events.

title: Хорот и оркестарот на скопското училиште Кузман освоија шест награди во Јесоло, Италија
creator: Елизабета Божиноска
description: Туристичкото место Јесоло во Италија ги отвори вратите за 500 учесници од 12 држави од Светот, меѓу кои и избраниците на професорката по музика, Вера Ангеловска од ООУ „Кузман Јосифовски – Питу“ од Кисела Вода. .На Светскиот куп во фолклор, учесниците настапија во различни дисциплини. Македонските претставници се одлучија за вокално-инструментален ансамбл со хорот и [...]Текстот Хорот и оркестарот на скопското училиште Кузман освоија шест награди во Јесоло, Италија е превземен од МАКФАКС.
content: Туристичкото место Јесоло во Италија ги отвори вратите за 500 учесници од 12 држави од Светот, меѓу кои и избраниците на професорката по музика, Вера Ангеловска од ООУ „Кузман Јосифовски – Питу“ од Кисела Вода. .На Светскиот куп во фолклор, учесниците настапија во различни дисциплини. Македонските претставници се одлучија за вокално-инструментален ансамбл со хорот и оркестарот, како и соло настапи на пет вокали солисти и еден соло инструмент – гитара. Старата македонска песна “Учи ме мајко карај ме” беше изборот на Ангеловска за хорот и оркестарот. Оваа музичка дружина, која брои 49 члена, од кои 39 вокали, осум флејтисти и двајца гитаристи, ја “стресе” бината. Под диригентската палка на Верче, кузмановци блеснаа на отворената сцена, а за комплетен впечаток се погрижи прекрасната кореографија со автентични македонски предмети, како и рецитирањето строфа од македонската љубовна песна Дениција. „Публиката задоволна, жирито исто така. Кузман и овој пат ги освои срцата на присутните. Освоеното второ место, пехарот, медаљите и дипломите ќе останат да сведочат за овој огромен успех на ООУ ‘Кузман Јосифовски – Питу’. Паричниот ваучер ќе биде само мотив повеќе да се продолжи со работа до следното претставување на голем музички настан. Во оваа конкуренција немаше освоено прво место “, велат од училиштето. За дефилето пред завршната вечер македонија беше одбрана од страна организаторот да ја предводи долгата редица натпреварувачи низ улиците на Јесоло па ечеа македонски песни и се вееја македонски знамиња. Солистите освоија едно прво место, две втори и две трети места, како и една пофалница. Македонските претставници велат дека добиле и ексклузивна покана за прием кај градоначалникот на Јесоло, Кристофер Де Зоти, кој ги поздравил и им посакал уште поголем успех во иднина на музичките таленти од Македонија.

title: French Open LIVE: Rafael Nadal departs Roland Garros plus latest tennis results today
creator: Kieran Jackson
description: Day 3 at Roland Garros will see Novak Djokovic and Katie Boulter in action following Rafael Nadal’s first-round exit on Monday
content: Novak Djokovic stars on Day 3 of the French Open following Rafael Nadal ’s dramatic first-round defeat to Alexander Zverev on Monday. The defeat for the 14-time champion could spell the end of his time at Roland Garros and Nadal will now decide on his plan for the summer, with Wimbledon and the Paris Olympics on the agenda. Djokovic, meanwhile, begins his bid for a 25th grand slam and faces French wildcard Pierre-Hugues Herbert tonight. Elsewhere, there is British interest with Katie Boulter and Dan Evans in action in what promises to be a fascinating day in Paris. Follow all the latest tennis scores and results from Day 3 at Roland Garros below, plus the latest reaction to Nadal’s potential French Open farewell:

title: 野, ‘운동권 셀프 특혜법’ 논란 민주유공자법 단독 처리
Reader's pictures show dead sharks on New Brighton beach
description: The bodies of what are believed to be nine Spotless Smooth Hound sharks were found on New Brighton beach over the Bank Holiday weekend
content: Pictures taken by Wez McInnes show bodies of some of the nine sharks lying on New Brighton beach on Saturday evening (May 25). One of the dead sharks that were found washed up on New Brighton beach over the Bank Holiday weekend (Image: Wez McInnes / Facebook) It is unclear exactly which breed the sharks are, but it is believed they are Starry Smooth Hound sharks, which are frequently caught on the region's coastlines. One of the dead sharks that were found washed up on New Brighton beach over the Bank Holiday weekend (Image: Wez McInnes / Facebook) One of the dead sharks that were found washed up on New Brighton beach over the Bank Holiday weekend (Image: Wez McInnes / Facebook) Wez, from Wallasey, told the Globe : "We were quite surprised to see them to be honest, as we’d never seen anything like that on the beach before. "Apparently they’re Starry Smooth Hound sharks, which if true are not usually found this side of the world."

title: Adigun, AGHAN Chairman Bags Aviation Personality of the year Award
creator: Olusegun Koiki
description: LAGOS – Mr. Olaniyi Adigun, the Chairman, Aviation Ground Handling Association of Nigeria (AGHAN), has been conferred with the 2023 Aviation Personality of the Year. The award was bestowed on Adigun at the 10th edition of the Nigeria Transport Lecture, organised by Nigeria Transport Award, publishers of the Transport Day, held on Thursday at Raddison [...]
content: LAGOS – Mr. Olaniyi Adigun, the Chairman, Aviation Ground Handling Association of Nigeria (AGHAN), has been conferred with the 2023 Aviation Personality of the Year award. The award was bestowed on Adigun at the 10th edition of the Nigeria Transport Lecture, organised by Nigeria Transport Award, publishers of the Transport Day, held on Thursday at Raddison Blu Hotel, Government Reserved Area (G.R.A), Ikeja, Lagos. The glamorous ceremony convened by Mr. Frank Kintum, the Chief Executive Officer (CEO), Transport Day, is an annual event where eminent personalities who have distinguished themselves in professional excellence and service to humanity in the private and public sectors are honoured. According to Kintum, Adigun was conferred with the special award in recognition of his huge contribution to the development of the aviation industry, especially the ground handling sub-sector where he has made a huge milestone in over three decades. Kintum explained that Adigun was selected for the award by the board and management of Transport Day after emerging tops in the polls conducted by the team. He specifically said that since Adigun was appointed the Chairman of AGHAN, he had been able to reposition the ground handling companies in the sector and worked endlessly to ensure a review of the former handling rates, which had been in existence in the last three decades. He said: “Mr. Olaniyi Adigun, the President of AGHAN was nominated for this honour after a rigorous exercise, which focused on his activities and achievements in the Nigerian aviation industry, spanning over three decades. Adigun through his works, has consistently promoted safety, which is the hallmark of the global aviation industry. “We want to use this medium to call on Adigun to continue to do more for the growth and development of the Nigerian aviation industry. To whom much is given, much more is expected from him.” In his speech, Adigun thanked the organisers of the event for finding him worthy to be selected for the honour. He also expressed delight at the achievements of AGHAN, but maintained that the association and the successes recorded were not about him, but its entire members. He added that the award had thrown AGHAN up for more good work. He said: “I feel very elated, appreciated and privileged to be awarded as the Aviation Personality of the Year 2023 after a long effort that we put into the sector, especially in the ground handling sector of the industry. “It is unfortunate that the ground handling sub-sector of the aviation industry has not been given fair deal and attention by the government and its agencies, but some organisations in the sector have realised the enormous work that we do and awarded me the honour. “Like I do say, the government and its agencies are always losing money because of unfair competition in the handling sub-sector of the industry, especially between the two major ground handling companies. AGHAN as a body, has been trying to bring the major competitors together for the enhanced Nigerian economy and we pray this will work out very soon and for the betterment of the industry and the country at large.” He regretted that the airlines were taking full advantage of the unhealthy competition between the two major ground handling companies, but said since AGHAN came onboard a few years ago, such unwholesome practice had reduced to the barest minimum. Adigun came into the aviation industry in 1993 as a staff of the defunct national carrier, Nigeria Airways. At the Skyway Aviation Handling Company (SAHCO), he rose through the ranks to become its Executive Director, Sales & Marketing from 2018- 2024. During his stay, the department was able to implement various sales and marketing strategies that increased the company’s revenue significantly, while its number of clienteles increased tremendously. Adigun was also appointed the pioneer Chairman of AGHAN in 2021.

title: Historisch Genootschap is fairtrade
description: Op 24 mei kwam een delegatie van Fairtrade Ambacht op de bezoek in oudheidkamer Den Brommert. Ze had voor het Historisch Genootschap een certificaat bij zich. Hierop wordt vermeld dat het Genootschap zich vanaf heden Fairtrade organisatie mag noemen. In het cadeauwinkeltje Den Brommert worden tegenwoordig ook bepaalde Fairtrade producten verkocht.
content: Op 24 mei kwam een delegatie van Fairtrade Ambacht op de bezoek in oudheidkamer Den Brommert. Ze had voor het Historisch Genootschap een certificaat bij zich. Hierop wordt vermeld dat het Genootschap zich vanaf heden Fairtrade organisatie mag noemen. In het cadeauwinkeltje Den Brommert worden tegenwoordig ook bepaalde Fairtrade producten verkocht. De nieuwe voorzitter van het Genootschap, Herman Jonker, verwelkomde de delegatie in Den Brommert. Hij memoreerde de steeds belangrijker plaats die de oudheidkamer met het winkeltje de laatste tijd in de Ambachtse samenleving inneemt. De vereniging wordt gedragen door ongeveer 70 vrijwilligers, die zich allen Pro Deo voor bepaalde werkzaamheden in de organisatie inzetten. Ook het cadeauwinkeltje in het monumentale pand wordt door steeds meer Ambachters ontdekt en gewaardeerd. Met de verkoop van bepaalde artikelen hoopt het Genootschap de doelstellingen van de Fairtrade organisatie te bevorderen. Floor van de Velde dankte het Genootschap dat ze ook Fairtrade organisatie wil worden. Veel winkels en horecabedrijven zijn het Genootschap al voorgegaan. Binnenkort zijn er in ons dorp al zoveel certificaten afgegeven zodat Ambacht zich thans Fairtrade gemeente mag noemen. Ooit begonnen met de bekende Max Havelaar koffie heeft de organisatie zich ontwikkeld tot een brede wereldwijde organisatie, die steeds meer erkenning en waardering krijgt. Het gaat daarbij om eerlijke handel, waardoor boeren en producenten een eerlijke prijs voor hun producten krijgen en kunnen werken onder gezonde en veilige omstandigheden. Milieudoelstellingen krijgen de laatste jaren steeds aandacht. Van de Velde memoreerde ook dat zich in het cadeauwinkeltje Den Brommert vroeger een wereldwinkel gevestigd was, Via de verkoop van veel producten werd dus al een aantal jaren geleden vanuit dit gebouw de Fairtrade gedachte in ons dorp uitgedragen. Die situatie is weer terug. Historisch Genootschap Arie Verhoeven

title: 5 Must-Buy Sport Shoes in 2024
creator: Noor
description: There is nothing better than hitting the pavement for your morning run while your favorite music plays in the background. As you push yourself to new limits, you realize the importance of having the right pair of sport shoes to support your performance and protect your feet. In 2024, the world of athletic shoes is [...]The post 5 Must-Buy Sport Shoes in 2024 appeared first on TechBullion.
content: Share Tweet Share Share Email There is nothing better than hitting the pavement for your morning run while your favorite music plays in the background. As you push yourself to new limits, you realize the importance of having the right pair of sport shoes to support your performance and protect your feet. In 2024, the world of athletic shoes is changing quickly. New technologies and designs are changing the way people do sports and work out. This article will show you the five best sports shoes of 2024, so you can stay ahead of the game. 1. Hoka Clifton 8 at Zappos The Hoka Clifton 8, available at Zappos, is a top choice for runners seeking comfort and performance. With its plush cushioning and lightweight design, the Clifton 8 provides a smooth and responsive ride, making it ideal for long-distance runs or everyday wear. Its breathable mesh upper keeps your feet cool and dry, while the durable outsole offers reliable traction on various surfaces. The Clifton 8’s roomy toe box allows for natural toe splay and accommodates different foot shapes comfortably. 2. Brooks Adrenaline GTS 22 The Brooks Adrenaline GTS 22 is a trusted choice for runners seeking stability and support. Featuring Brooks’ innovative GuideRails technology, the Adrenaline GTS 22 helps keep your feet aligned and reduces excess movement, minimizing the risk of injury. Its plush cushioning provides exceptional comfort, while the engineered mesh upper offers a secure and breathable fit. The Adrenaline GTS 22’s responsive midsole ensures a smooth and stable ride, making it suitable for runners of all levels. 3. Nike Women’s Pegasus 39 Known for its responsive cushioning and sleek design, the Pegasus 39 delivers a comfortable and supportive ride with every step. Its breathable mesh upper keeps your feet cool and comfortable, while the Zoom Air unit in the forefoot provides responsive cushioning and energy return. The Pegasus 39’s durable outsole offers excellent traction on various surfaces, making it suitable for both indoor and outdoor activities. 4. On Running Cloud X Designed to handle various activities, from running to gym workouts, the Cloud X offers a lightweight and responsive ride that’s perfect for athletes of all levels. Its CloudTec cushioning technology provides excellent shock absorption and energy return, ensuring a comfortable and supportive feel with every step. The Cloud X’s breathable mesh upper allows for optimal airflow, keeping your feet cool and comfortable during intense workouts. Its flexible construction adapts to your foot’s natural movement, while the durable outsole delivers reliable traction on both indoor and outdoor surfaces. 5. Reebok Nano X2 Training Shoes Built to withstand the rigors of intense workouts and training sessions, the Nano X2 offers stability, support, and durability in one stylish package. Its sturdy construction protects lateral movements and high-impact activities, while its flexible design allows for natural foot movement and agility. The Nano X2’s responsive cushioning absorbs shock and provides comfort, allowing you to push your limits and achieve your fitness goals with confidence. Explore These Sports Shoes for Your Athletic Needs From cutting-edge technologies to sustainable designs, the must-buy sports shoes for 2024 offer something for every athlete. Explore these options to find the perfect fit for your athletic endeavors. title: Joaquin Domagoso on being a young dad: ''Yung purpose ko sa buhay, nabuo'
description: It has been almost two years since Joaquin Domagoso became a father to his son, Scott.
content: It has been almost two years since Joaquin Domagoso became a father to his son, Scott. In his interview on Tuesday's "Fast Talk with Boy Abunda," the Sparkle star shared that the little boy has started schooling. "I'm happy where my son is. He started school officially, so congrats to little Scott. Every day, new memories are being made," Joaquin said. The young actor said that he stands by the decisions he made. "My career won't stop itself because of my decisions because my will is as strong as my love for my son," he said. When asked what he discovered about himself as he goes through fatherhood, Joaquin said, "That I can work harder than I think I can't. There are things na before, I feel like, 'Hindi, kaya ko 'yon, pabayaan na, 'wag na.'" Now that he is already a dad, Joaquin said that he has also become a role model. "Kumbaga if I don't do these things, my son won't—'di niya ako susundan," he said. "And there are other things na, kumbaga, work. Working a 9-5 job, realizing it how other people would go through it. 'Yung tipong you wake up for your son, you do all these things. Tapos 'yung at the end of the day, uuwi ka, hinihintay ka pa rin. All the joys. 'Yung purpose ko sa buhay, nabuo." Joaquin did not share much about his current relationship status. "Sa aking love life ngayon po, I don't want to say anything too much, but right now, I'm in a very happy place," he said. Joaquin's dad, Isko Moreno , first revealed in July 2022 that Joaquin had welcomed a baby boy with Raffa Castro . In a previous interview on the show, Joaquin admitted that he felt scared of becoming a father , but his father was supportive about it. "He was dancing. Sumasayaw si Papa," he said. "Nawala 'yung stress ko 'cause I was so scared to tell them like what is my dad gonna say? Baka magalit. Magagalit sila." Joaquin currently appears in GMA Afternoon Prime series " Lilet Matias: Attorney-at-Law ," which airs weekdays at 3:20 p.m. after "Abot-Kamay Na Pangarap."

title: Хороскопски знаци кои се љубоморни на своите браќа и сестри
creator: А. O. / Макфакс
description: Не, ова не е класичното благо ривалство помеѓу браќата и сестрите. Знаците кои се љубоморни на своите блиски можат да одат чекор понатаму. Дури и кога се млади, овие хороскопски знаци се однесуваат прилично лошо со своите браќа и сестри. Тие се љубоморни, конкурентни и бараат внимание од родителите само за нив. Нивните родители секојдневно [...]Текстот Хороскопски знаци кои се љубоморни на своите браќа и сестри е превземен од МАКФАКС.
content: Не, ова не е класичното благо ривалство помеѓу браќата и сестрите. Знаците кои се љубоморни на своите блиски можат да одат чекор понатаму. Дури и кога се млади, овие хороскопски знаци се однесуваат прилично лошо со своите браќа и сестри. Тие се љубоморни, конкурентни и бараат внимание од родителите само за нив. Нивните родители секојдневно мораат да се справуваат со расправии и викање низ дома, а често има моменти кога мораат да носат и мировен шлем. Ако Овенот е првото дете во семејството, тогаш проблемот е уште поголем. Тие ги гледаат своите браќа и сестри како закана и конкуренција. Претставниците на овој знак се многу себични и сакаат се да биде нивно. Не знаат да ги споделат работите и доколку нивните помлади роднини не се послушни, тоа ќе биде голем проблем што ќе треба да го решат на свој начин. Што секако нема да биде одлично решение. Шкорпиите се многу љубоморни и посесивни. Сакаат се за себе. Поточно, тие сакаат се или ништо. Ќе направат се за да земат се од нивните браќа и сестри затоа што се разбира, тоа (што и да е) им припаѓа само нив. Ќе станат злобни и ќе им постават стапица на своите роднини. Тие се посесивни дури и кога се во прашање нивните родители и веруваат дека му припаѓаат нему и не сакаат да ги делат со никого. Биковите функционираат на сличен начин како и Шкорпиите. Тие се и многу посесивни и љубоморни и сакаат се за себе. Ним им треба целото внимание, без разлика дали се работи за игра, музичка изведба или само соба во куќата. Тоа е доволно само за нив и ништо друго не им треба. Иако се на крај, немојте да мислите дека тие се помалку конкурентни или љубоморни од другите знаци. Особено, ако се првородени. Тогаш тие се за нијанса позлобни кон своите роднини. Тоа е затоа што чувствува дека неговиот престол е дома. Зошто дојдовте во семејството и зошто сите одеднаш се загрижени за вас? Ова е особено проблематично ако другото дете се гледа како слатко и привлекува внимание.

title: Wat wil ik later worden?
description: Donderdag 23 mei vond de jaarlijkse Bedrijvenroute Zwijndrecht plaats. Dan brengen tweedejaars leerlingen van het voortgezet onderwijs een bezoek aan verschillende bedrijven ter oriëntatie van hun profielkeuze.
content: . Leerlingen kiezen een beroepsprofiel in hun tweede leerjaar van het voortgezet onderwijs. Dat dit doorgaans geen gemakkelijke keuze is weet ook Esther Smit, de gemeentelijke accountmanager van Zwijndrecht Onderneemt: ”De Bedrijvenroute is jaarlijks en komt vanuit de Ondernemersvereniging Zwijndrecht. Tweedejaars leerlingen van het Develstein College, Loket Zwijndrecht, Het Walburg College en twee vierdejaars klassen van de Sprong doen eraan mee. Dus alle Zwijndrechtse scholen van het voortgezet onderwijs zijn vertegenwoordigd. Per bus bezoeken leerlingen met hun docent diverse bedrijven en instellingen in Zwijndrecht, die aansluiten bij hun interesse. Dit helpt hen om hun uiteindelijke keuzerichting te definiëren. Want een beroepskeuze maken op die jonge leeftijd is niet eenvoudig. Eigenlijk kun je het zien als een taart met diverse lagen: de leerlingen snuffelen aan alle facetten van het bedrijfsleven. Daarom is deze tour ook zo’n succes. We organiseren dit met een heel team, waarin Menno Hooimeijer van de Ondernemersvereniging Zwijndrecht een belangrijk aandeel heeft. Bedrijven kunnen zichzelf ook aanmelden. Het is een forse logistieke uitdaging, maar het is het zeker waard. Zo weet ik dat een leerling van 12 jaren geleden meeging met de route en nu bij een van die bedrijven werkzaam is.” “De leerlingen bepalen van te voren de richting van hun voorkeur. De keuze bestaat uit een pakket van bedrijven die ze kunnen bezoeken. Ze kunnen dan terecht komen bij de brandweer, een nagelstyliste of bij een mondhygiëniste. Sommige leerlingen hebben een scherper beeld van hun beroepskeuze dan anderen. Om te toetsen hoever ze in hun proces zijn krijgen de jongeren een werkboekje met opdrachten mee. Zo moeten zij bijvoorbeeld een interview houden met een werknemer van de bedrijven die ze bezoeken. Een aantal reacties die betrokkenen achterlieten op de website van de bedrijvenroute geven blijk van een succesvolle strategie: “Aan de hand van mijn vragen, ontdekte ik of dit bedrijf bij mij zou passen. Het was een mooi gesprek en zeker een leuk bedrijfsbezoek” , vindt een Develstein College-leerling. De office manager van Yellow Works had ook een positieve indruk: “ Voor mij was het de eerste keer dat ik meedeed aan de route. Als bedrijf vind ik het belangrijk dat jongeren kunnen zien waar ze in de toekomst kunnen werken.” En een begeleidend docent van Loket geeft een voorbeeld van een gestelde vraag: “Het was een soort speurtocht door het bedrijf heen en leerlingen konden hun vragen stellen. Een van de vragen was: ‘Met welk product uit jullie bedrijf maken jullie de meeste winst?’. Als docent ben ik super trots op mijn leerlingen”. De Bedrijvenroute wordt jaarlijks mogelijk gemaakt door Ondernemersvereniging Zwijndrecht, daarbij geholpen door de accountmanagers van Zwijndrecht Onderneemt in het zoeken naar matches en financieel mogelijk gemaakt door het Ondernemersfonds Zwijndrecht en de Gemeente Zwijndrecht.

title: Okružná križovatka na Nerudovej ulici je hotová, dopravu obnovia koncom týždňa
description: Investorom v tomto prípade nebolo mesto, ale súkromná spoločnosť, ktorá si vytvorila príjazdovú komunikáciu k budúcemu obchodnému centru.
content: Okružná križovatka na Nerudovej ulici je hotová, dopravu obnovia koncom týždňa - | 28.5.2024, 11.04, prispievatelia Nová okružná križovatka na je už hotová. Dopravu na ňu pustia najneskôr 31. mája o 20:00, ale je možné, že aj o niečo skôr. Križovatka aj s príjazdovou cestou k budúcemu Kauflandu je zhotovená , v súčasnosti plynú už len nevyhnutné technologické termíny, ktoré si tento materiál vyžaduje. Okrem samotných komunikácií pribudla aj pri rožnom bytovom dome na Nerudovej. Po obnovení dopravy v tejto časti mesta si vydýchnu predovšetkým obyvatelia Ulice Gábora Steinera a Ulice Maxima Gorkého, cez ktoré bola nákladná doprava presmerovaná. Pôvodne hrozilo, že cez tieto ulice pôjde aj nákladná doprava z diaľnice D1, ktorá tadiaľ mala byť presmerovaná v súvislosti s opravou diaľničnej križovatky D1 a R1, Národná diaľničná spoločnosť napokon zvolila iné riešenie. Po otvorení križovatky sa . Nerudova ulica je pre výstavbu okružnej križovatky uzatvorená od 2. apríla. Investorom v tomto prípade nebolo mesto, ale súkromná spoločnosť.

title: EFL Latest: The latest League One and Two news across the day
creator: Stephen Thirkill
description: Business is picking up around the EFL with clubs taking advantage of soon-to-be free agents.
content: Here we bring you the latest news from across League One and Two for Tuesday May 28. Join the debate on our social media channels Manager Martin Paterson has left Burton Albion after the club narrowly avoided relegation from League One, BBC Radio Derby reports. The role at Pirelli Stadium was the 37-year-old former Swansea City, Barnsley and Inter Miami assistant manager's first job in charge of a senior side. Thoughts? “It’s been in the works for a while. I’m really looking forward to getting started. “I had positive chats with the manager and it’s a club with real potential with the project and the plans that he has got in place. “The run the club went on towards the end of last season made everyone pay attention. It’s a good club with a good manager and I’m hoping we can do good things.” League Two champs Stockport County have a new man. Jay Mingi has joined from Colchester. Notts County have signed Bradford City defender Matty Platt on a two-year contract - the League Two club's first summer signing. Platt, 26, moves to Meadow Lane on a free transfer following two years with the Bantams. He moved to Valley Parade after three years at Barrow, who he helped win promotion back to the Football League Two in 2020. "Jay had a fantastic back end of the League Two season at Colchester," "He showed his versatility and intelligence, switching from a familiar central midfield role to wide centre-back, right-back and right wing-back at times. “We believe he has real potential to develop, whilst immediately having the physical characteristics of being on the front foot, aggressive and quick, which will allow him to flourish in League One." "It became apparent during the review that the club and Pete had different perspectives on the way forward," "So it was mutually agreed that this was the best and most appropriate way to proceed. "We wish Pete well in his future endeavours." What do you make of Pete Wild’s sacking? Jordan Gibson has arrived from Carlisle United It’s a busy morning around League’s One and Two after the Bank Holiday weekend. Here are some of the headline makers.

title: Tribal violence, rain and mosquitoes: making sense of the Papua New Guinea landslide
description: A landslide that occurred in Papua New Guinea is believed to have buried over 2,000 people. Experts are attributing this disaster to massive tectonic forces, tribal conflicts, and the presence of mosquitoes, trying to understand the severity of the situation. Papua New Guinea is known as one of the most disaster-prone nations globally.
content: PORT MORESBY: A landslide in Papua New Guinea is feared to have buried more than 2,000 people, with experts pointing to colossal tectonic forces, tribal clashes and mosquitoes to make sense of the crisis. One of the most disaster-prone nations in the world, Papua New Guinea occupies a slice of the southwest Pacific that is frequently battered by earthquakes, flooding and volcanic eruptions. But even by these volatile standards, the emergency unfolding in the highlands of Enga province could rank among the country's most lethal natural disasters . Here's why: The bustling highlands community on the shoulder of Mount Mungalo was destroyed when a landslide struck in the early hours of Friday morning. Scores of homes and the people sleeping inside them were buried beneath an avalanche of boulders, mud and uprooted trees. Papua New Guinea sits atop the seismic Ring of Fire, an arc of intense tectonic activity that stretches through Southeast Asia and across the Pacific basin. "Papua New Guinea sits right on a plate boundary, where these large, rigid parts of the earth plough into each other," University of Adelaide geologist Alan Collins told AFP. "This creates mountains, steep slopes and other extreme topography. "You have these steep slopes located in an area of heavy rainfall, and this can rot the minerals in the rocks, and gradually weaken them." Human influences, such as the clearing of native forests, made the slopes of these highland mountains even more precarious. "You put all of those things together, and you can create a very unstable environment," Collins said. Lying just south of the equator, Papua New Guinea has one of the wettest climates in the world. Research has found shifting rainfall patterns linked to climate change could further exacerbate the risk of landslides. As disaster workers entered the remote disaster zone, they realised population estimates failed to account for dozens of families seeking sanctuary in the area. Serhan Aktoprak, chief of the United Nations ' migration agency in Papua New Guinea, said the "internally displaced" Tulpar people had moved into the village "as they escaped from another tribal conflict elsewhere". Highland clans have fought each other in Papua New Guinea for centuries, but a recent influx of mercenaries and automatic weapons has inflamed tensions. The Red Cross estimates as many as 30,000 people are displaced by tribal violence in Papua New Guinea every year. Papua New Guinea has one of the least concentrated urban populations in the world. Some 40 percent of people are thought to eschew its coastal cities in favour of highland regions in the country's interior. The highlands are a mix of rolling jungle mountains, dense tropical rainforests and twisting river valleys. Nestled amongst this unforgiving terrain are some of the fastest growing and most densely packed communities in the country. There are myriad factors that could explain this, including high rates of polygyny, falling death rates and long-formed attachments to ancestral homelands. Most highland communities occupy a kind of "goldilocks zone", sitting at altitudes between 1,400 metres (4,600 feet) and 2,600 metres high. Researchers have found this helps them stave off the risk of malarial infections that run rampant through lower-lying areas. Reliable census figures are notoriously difficult to get in Papua New Guinea, hampered by the difficult terrain, severe weather, and remoteness of many communities. While the country's official population is given as 10 million, some demographers suggest the number of citizens could be almost twice as high. Enga provincial administrator Sandis Tsaka said officials had first gauged the size of the disaster-struck community using an outdated electoral roll that only counted those 18 and older. These initial underestimates of the community's population helped to explain why death toll figures have jumped around so much. Early estimates in the immediate aftermath of the landslide suggested a death toll between 100 and 500 people. Days later these figures would be drastically revised by the country's National Disaster Centre -- which stated "more than 2,000 people" were feared to be "buried alive". It could take weeks before anything near a definitive number emerges. Papua New Guinea's northern coast was swamped by a 10 metre (30 foot) tsunami in 1998, killing more than 2,200 people in one of the country's worst natural disasters.

title: 김어준 유튜브 출연한 윤상현, 尹·韓 묶어 ‘검사 출신 정치’ 비판
Iran reports 43% surge in tourism arrivals in 2023
description: Tehran, IRNA -- Tourism arrivals in Iran rose by 43% last year, allowing the country to ascend in the global ranking of top destinations by six places, according to data released by the United Nations tourism agency (UNWTO).
content: The figures by the World Tourism Organization cited in a Tuesday report by the IRNA showed that some 5.9 million tourists had arrived in Iran last year, up from 4.1 million reported in 2022. The surge allowed Iran to move up six places to 34th in UNWTO’s ranking of top international destinations. Tourist arrivals in Iran had increased by four times in 2022 compared to 2021 when the spread of the coronavirus pandemic had hit the industry hard.

title: Xiaomi raises delivery target for the SU7 – again
creator: Carla Westerheide
description: Xiaomi has increased the delivery target for its first electric car to 120,000 units in 2024. The Chinese carmaker previously aimed for 100,000 SU7 deliveries this year.
content: Xiaomi management confirmed the 20 per cent increase in a conference call with Asian media. The company will deliver “at least” 100,000 SU7s this year, but aims for a target of 120,000 units. Xiaomi that it intends to produce the SU7 in two shifts at its factory in Beijing from June. At least 10,000 vehicles per month would thus roll off the production line. To reach its target of 120,000 cars, the company would need to ramp up production, as Xiaomi would have to build 10,000 vehicles every month throughout the year. But that is not the case. The SU7 was only , with prices starting at 27,600 euros. A few days later, . Then, at the end of April, the SU7 was the main attraction at the motor show in Beijing. Visitors even had to queue outside the stand to see the SU7 up close. In addition to the electric drive, Xiaomi focuses primarily on connectivity and the content on its displays. Our shows what driving a smartphone on wheels is like.

title: The Future Of Finance: AI And Blockchain Bridging Traditional Investment For A Better Tomorrow
creator: Ethan Lee | Prime Star
description: In the world of finance where new changes are occurring at a very fast pace, investments through conventional finance and the incorporation of technology like artificial intelligence are not just a trend but a revolution. This fusion is empowering the investment ecosystem for transparency, open access, and future-readiness bringing financial opportunities closer to everyone. At [...]The post The Future Of Finance: AI And Blockchain Bridging Traditional Investment For A Better Tomorrow appeared first on TechBullion.
content: Share Tweet Share Share Email In the world of finance where new changes are occurring at a very fast pace, investments through conventional finance and the incorporation of technology like artificial intelligence are not just a trend but a revolution. This fusion is empowering the investment ecosystem for transparency, open access, and future-readiness bringing financial opportunities closer to everyone. At the center of this process, there are two key areas – artificial intelligence and blockchain, which are actively getting involved in the recreation of people’s vision of investments. Big data, through the use of artificial intelligence and other predictive analytical tools, is enhancing the opportunities for making sound investment decisions while blockchain is the godsend for truly secure financial transactions. In parallel, the mentioned technologies are providing the foundation for new trends like tokenized assets, decentralized finance (DeFi), and relatively a new approach – DeFi or Regenerative Finance, based on the investment in social and environmental initiatives. Thus, Tokenized assets with the help of blockchain technology, it is a step forward. In essence, through the tokenization of physical assets using blockchain, investors can own a fraction of the asset because the technology subdivides the ownership rights to the underlying asset into smaller portions. This democratization of assets applies to various fields of the economy and have started with real estate assets, artworks, and even unique rarities. Furthermore, AI occupies a crucial place in this environment because it offers the instruments for the precise analysis of the great amount of information and anticipating market behaviors. For instance, using AI algorithms is possible to detect attractive investments’ options in real-time and thus maximize investment outcomes. We observe this symbiotic relationship between AI and blockchain in such areas such as digital coins and tokens that have become fashionable. These digital assets usually have initial and/or subsequent rewards where more or new coin holders are bestowed with free tokens making the cryptocurrency investment more attractive and easily accessible. This though creates the potential of making huge profits through these unique financial entities. _algoic trading strategies are capable of making trades in a very short time and exploiting gaps in the overall market that may not be apparent to a human trader. While the above mentioned transactions have a lot of possibility of being fraudulent or manipulated, with the use of blockchain, it maximizes the security and transparency as well. This high-performance, high-speed, highly effective system is a significant improvement and will be of tremendous help to experienced investors and newcomers alike. Moreover, establishing ReFi as the trend of investment with an aim is proving to be rather popular. As integrated AI and blockchain solutions, ReFi projects work to create positive social and environmental impacts alongside solutions for money. Such projects may involve climate change solutions like energy generation from natural sources, efficient farming, and social justice products, which give individuals an opportunity to invest in the future and generate profits. Another work in progress key feature of the evolution of the investment landscape is decentralized finance (DeFi) platform. These platforms utilize blockchain technology to dispose of the middlemen and cut the costs but at the same time improved efficacy. DeFi puts people in the position of providing and requesting funds, goods, or services, with others and often presents artificial intelligence solutions to perform the necessary operations. Due to this transparency, all transactions made and captured in the block chain are traceable by the public thereby minimizing on cases of disputations and increasing trust among the players involved. Furthermore, the usage of airdrop has evolved as a vital strategy for attracting the community and involving the users in the DeFi ecosystem. It explains how through providing a variety of tokens users with free tokens DeFi projects can gain popularity very quickly and encourage people to engage in activities within their platforms. Integrating AI into Defi platforms enhances some of the functionality of DeFi platforms in the following ways. AI can be applied to identify users’ behavior and patterns, market trends and fluctuations, and provide recommendations on which investments should be made, how they should be distributed, and which direction the market is likely to take nex so you can make moneyt. Such level of customization and idea of future in financial aspect was beyond the boldest scenario in traditional finance. Furthermore, it is capable of analyzing unstructured data hence can include social feeds, oil price changes, Acts of God, tweets erratically, and any other issues that relate to investment. They integrate this approach to make sure that AI driven investments not only yield higher returns but are also immune to instabilities in the market conditions. To conclude, the integration of the traditional financial industry with top-notch technological solutions such as the use of AI and blockchain technologies is making the investment environment more comprehensive and effective. The decentralization of possibilities and the mitigation of risks, through using Artificial Intelligence in trading, and by means of tokenization, the advent of DeFi, ReFi – these trends are contributing towards a more open and explicable approach to investments. As to the possibilities of earning money through these new financial tools, the prospect can be very high, and it opens a new vista to all those involved in the financial market whether a new player or an experienced investor. It can, therefore, be concluded that as we advance in the future, the promotion and application of such advanced technologies are bound to come up with more groundbreaking specialty investment and consequently yield a positive future for a worthy better future for generations. title: El Salvador is now Hub for Diverse Business Operations
creator: Paul Ugbede Godwin
description: El Salvador, the smallest and most densely populated country in Central America, is experiencing a significant economic transformation. With over 80 companies establishing their operations in the nation, it’s becoming a hub for diverse business activities. This surge in corporate presence is a testament to the country’s strategic efforts to diversify its economy and create [...]The post El Salvador is now Hub for Diverse Business Operations appeared first on Tekedia.
content: El Salvador, the smallest and most densely populated country in Central America, is experiencing a significant economic transformation. With over 80 companies establishing their operations in the nation, it’s becoming a hub for diverse business activities. This surge in corporate presence is a testament to the country’s strategic efforts to diversify its economy and create a more conducive environment for business growth. Historically, El Salvador’s economy was heavily reliant on agriculture, with coffee exports being the primary source of revenue. However, the turn of the century marked a pivotal shift as the country adopted the U.S. dollar as its official currency, paving the way for increased trade and financial links. This move, coupled with the expansion of the manufacturing sector, has reduced the nation’s dependence on coffee and positioned it as an attractive destination for international businesses. The list of companies operating in El Salvador is diverse, ranging from financial institutions like the Central Reserve Bank of El Salvador to telecommunications giants such as Claro El Salvador and Tigo El Salvador. The country also boasts a vibrant media landscape with entities like El Faro and La Prensa Gráfica, reflecting a robust mass media sector. Tekedia Mini-MBA edition 14 (June 3 – Sept 2, 2024) begins registrations; get massive discounts with early registration here. Tekedia AI in Business Masterclass opens registrations here. Join Tekedia Capital Syndicate and i nvest in Africa’s finest startups here . In recent years, El Salvador has seen a rise in startups and innovative companies, further enriching its economic landscape. Companies like Cubo, which supports small businesses with digital payments, and intmax, a developer of blockchain platforms, are prime examples of the new wave of tech-driven enterprises flourishing in the country. These startups not only contribute to the economy but also bring fresh ideas and technologies to the forefront. The retail sector in El Salvador is not left behind, with companies like SIMAN and Supermercados Super Selectos providing a wide range of consumer goods. The Unicomer Group, a retailer of durable goods and electronics, signifies the growth potential in the consumer services industry. El Salvador’s commitment to nurturing a business-friendly environment is evident in its support for these companies. The government’s initiatives to streamline business operations, enhance legal frameworks, and invest in infrastructure have played a crucial role in attracting and retaining businesses. The influx of companies in El Salvador is a positive indicator of the country’s economic health and its potential for future growth. It’s a narrative of resilience and strategic adaptation, showcasing how a nation can pivot from traditional economic models to embrace globalization and technological advancements. Moreover, El Salvador’s adoption of the U.S. dollar as its official currency has streamlined financial transactions and bolstered investor confidence. This economic stability, coupled with the government’s efforts to diversify the economy, has made the country an attractive destination for foreign investment. The presence of these companies signifies a positive shift in El Salvador’s economic landscape, promising a future of prosperity and opportunity. As El Salvador continues to welcome businesses from around the globe, it stands as a testament to the resilience and entrepreneurial spirit of its people. As El Salvador continues to welcome businesses from various sectors, it stands as a beacon of economic opportunity in Central America. The country’s journey is a compelling story of transformation, one that other nations looking to revitalize their economies can learn from. El Salvador’s progress serves as a reminder that with the right policies and a focus on innovation, even the smallest countries can make a significant impact on the global economic stage.

title: A tropical storm floods villages and cuts power to millions in parts of Bangladesh and India
creator: N/A (Associated Press)
description: DHAKA, Bangladesh (AP) — The weakening tropical storm Remal flooded dozens of coastal villages and left nearly 30 million people without power Monday in southern Bangladesh and eastern India. At least 10 people died in Bangladesh.
content: DHAKA, Bangladesh (AP) — The weakening tropical storm Remal flooded dozens of coastal villages and left nearly 30 million people without power Monday in southern Bangladesh and eastern India. At least 10 people died in Bangladesh. About 3.7 million people along the coast were affected, said Bangladesh's junior minister for disaster management and relief, Mohibbur Rahman. More than 35,000 homes were destroyed and nearly 115,000 were damaged. Nearly 800,000 people were evacuated from vulnerable areas on Sunday. Bangladesh, a delta nation of nearly 170 million people, has a history of violent storms. Disaster preparedness programs have upgraded the capacity to tackle natural disasters, resulting in fewer casualties. Changing climate patterns have increased storms' intensity, making preparations more urgent. Remal weakened after making landfall in Bangladesh's Patuakhali district early Monday, with sustained winds of 111 kilometers (69 miles) per hour. India's Meteorological Department said it was likely to weaken throughout the day, but warned of heavy showers over Assam and other northeastern states for the next two days. India's Kolkata airport reopened after being shut Sunday. Bangladesh shut the airport in the country's second largest city, Chattogram, and canceled all domestic flights to and from the coastal district of Cox's Bazar. Loading and unloading at Chittagong seaport was halted. Strong rain and winds battered the Bangladesh capital, Dhaka. Many roads were submerged. Authorities ordered all government officials to stay at their stations until the situation improved. Aid agencies said they deployed thousands of volunteers in Rohingya refugee camps and other affected areas to provide emergency support. Bangladesh has sprawling camps housing more than 1 million Rohingya refugees from Myanmar in Cox's Bazar. In India's West Bengal state, thatched roofs on houses were blown away and electric poles and trees were uprooted in some coastal districts. Heavy downpours inundated streets and homes in low-lying areas of Kolkata. All schools in the region were closed until further notice. ___ AP video journalist Al-emrun Garjon contributed to this report.

title: Begini Reaksi Cristiano Ronaldo Usai Pecahkan Rekor sebagai Pencetak Gol Terbanyak di Liga Arab Saudi
description: Cristiano Ronaldo juga mencatat rekor sebagai pemain yang pernah menjadi top skor di empat liga berbeda.
content: Pemain Al Nassr Cristiano Ronaldo memecahkan rekor gol terbanyak dalam sejarah Liga Arab Saudi (Saudi Pro League). Klub Real Valladolid yang dimiliki mantan pemain Timnas Brasil, Ronaldo Luis Nazario de Lima, berhasil promosi ke strata tertinggi Liga Spanyol. Cristiano Ronaldo, yang kini berusia 39 tahun, kembali dipanggil Timnas Portugal untuk Euro 2024. Cristiano Ronaldo menduduki puncak daftar atlet dengan bayaran tertinggi versi Forbes untuk keempat kali sepanjang kariernya. Al Hilal berhasil menjuara Liga Arab Saudi (Saydi Pro League) setelah menang 4-1 atas Al Hazm. Ronaldo dan Al Nassr masih berpeluang raih trofi. Menpora RI Dito Ariotedjo membahas kerja sama olahraga dengan klub sepak bola Arab Saudi yang diperkuat Cristiano Ronaldo, Al Nassr. Ronaldo memotret Laut Merah dan menandai kunjungannya ke The St. Regis Resort Red Sea, sebuah properti mewah yang menjadi perhatian. Megabintang sepak bola asal Portugal, Cristiano Ronaldo, mengucapkan selamat Idul Fitri kepada umat Islam di dunia. Pemain Al-Nassr Sadio Mane dikenal karena kedermawanannya terhadap desa Bambali, tempat tinggalnya. Berikut perjalanan karier Mane. Sadio Mane bintang Al Nassr dikenal kedermawanannya untuk kampung halamannya, Bambali, Senegal. Berikut 8 amal jariyah Mane untuk kampungnya.

content: · Сред избраните заглавия са анимациите „Патешки истории“, „Тролчетата“, „Зайчето Питър 2: По широкия свят“ и много други По случай Международния ден на детето A1 клуб и Комсед подаряват на абонатите на Xplore TV 50% отстъпка на избрани детски анимационни филми с любимите герои. Сред заглавията в А1 Видеотека са както някои от най-новите, така и някои от най-обичаните анимации като „Патешки истории“, „Тролчетата“, „Зайчето Питър 2: По широкия свят“, „Смърфовете“ и много други. „Патешки истории“ разказва за приключението, в което се впуска едно обикновено патешко семейство, опознавайки света. Забавната анимация е поредният детски филм от създателите на хитове като „Миньоните“, „Аз проклетникът“ и други познати, който показва красотата на света и учи децата на добродетели по креативен и разбираем за тях начин. Историята ни среща със семейство Малард, които цял живот плуват в своето езеро в Нова Англия, без да знаят нищо за останалия свят. Когато един ден семейство прелетни птици ги посещава и разказва за вълнуващите си преживявания от далечни дестинации, мама Пам решава, че иска да покаже света на своите деца Дакс и Гуен. Така патиците потеглят на неочаквано приключение чак до Ямайка, по време на което преоткриват себе си и създават страхотни приятелства. Анимацията е чудесен повод за прекарване на повече време със семейството, а сега е достъпна на половин цена за зрителите на А1 Видеотека. Анимираната комедия „Тролчетата“ е още едно заглавие, което по повод празника на най-малките може да бъде гледано с 50% отстъпка от всички зрители на А1 Видеотека. Филмът ни отвежда в щурия свят на тролчетата, където всички се веселят, танцуват и пеят по цял ден, а щастието и добротата са най-голямата им сила. Позитивният им живот бива помрачен, когато гигантът Бергенс напада селцето, в което живеят и отвлича някои от тях. Тогава Попи и Бранч решават да поемат на приключение и да спасят приятелите си. Филмът ни пренася в един цветен и бляскав свят, където няма невъзможни неща, а музиката може да бъде решение на всички проблеми. В продължението на филма „Зайчето Питър“ Томас и Беа вече са женени и живеят заедно с Питър и неговото заешко семейство. Въпреки обещанието за нов живот и положените усилия, пакостливият Питър не може да се промени. Бягайки от дома, той отива в големия град, където опасностите дебнат от всеки ъгъл, а Питър отново навлича неприятности на своето семейство. Докато всички го търсят, пред него стои изборът дали да се върне у дома, или завинаги да продължи с лудориите. „Зайчето Питър 2: По широкия свят“ е забавна комедия, подходяща за цялото семейство, която сега е достъпна за всички зрители на А1 Видеотека на промоционална цена с отстъпка от 50%. По случай празника на детето абонатите на А1 Видеотека могат да избират между поредица от забавни детски филми, сред които също са „Смърфовете“, „Аз проклетникът“, „Бебе Бос“, „Пес Патрул: Супер филмът“, „Котаракът в чизми“ и още много други. До 9 юни заглавията може да бъдат наемани на половин цена и да се гледат неограничен брой пъти в рамките на 48 часа. title: EU top diplomat says Ukraine has right to strike Russia
creator: AFP
description: European Union High Representative for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy Josep Borrell. Photo: AFP
content: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell on Tuesday urged countries to balance fear of escalation against Ukraine's need to defend itself, saying Kyiv had the right to use Western arms to strike in Russia. "According with the law of war, it is perfectly possible and there is no contradiction. "I could retaliate or I could fight against the one who fights against me from his territory," Borrell said at the start of a meeting with European Union defence ministers. "You have to balance the risk of escalation and the need for Ukrainians to defend." Ukraine has been pressing its Western backers to allow it to hit targets in Russia using the longer-range weaponry Kyiv's supporters are supplying. Key backers including the United States and Germany have been reluctant to permit Kyiv to strike over the border out of fear that it could drag them closer to direct conflict with Moscow. Borrell's assertion was backed up by several other defence ministers at the gathering in Brussels. Dutch minister Kajsa Ollongren said The Netherlands had no restrictions and that she hoped "other countries that have different positions will change that". "It is quite feasible that they have to strike also inside Russia," Ollongren said. "My perspective is that should not be the debate." Estonia's Hanno Pevkur said he "truly hopes that all the countries who have these assets will also give the permission to Ukraine". "It cannot be normal that Russia is attacking from very deep into Ukrainian territory and the Ukrainians are fighting with one hand behind their back," he said. The calls came after NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg said on Monday "the time had come" for allies to reconsider their restrictions, especially as Russia is pounding the Ukrainian city of Kharkiv from its own territory. The debate over Ukrainian strikes inside Russia comes as NATO countries are struggling to come up with air defence systems desperately needed by Kyiv. Stoltenberg said last month that allies had agreed to give more air defences but since then there have been no new systems pledged. Dutch minister Ollongren said The Netherlands was now working on an initiative to assemble a Patriot air defence system in close cooperation with several partners to send to Ukraine. "We will deliver, from our own capabilities, several parts of the system so that we can assemble the whole system and deliver it to Ukraine," she said. Independent journalism costs money. title: Deadly landslide threatens thousands more in PNG as hopes for survivors fade
description: PORT MORESBY — Papua New Guinea authorities say nearly 7,900 people living near the site of a deadly landslide are "at risk" as rock and debris continue to move down the hillside.An alert for
content: PORT MORESBY — Papua New Guinea authorities say nearly 7,900 people living near the site of a deadly landslide are "at risk" as rock and debris continue to move down the hillside. An alert for potential evacuation has been put out, with a province official saying the mountain remains "very active". Rescuers say it is increasingly unlikely that victims will be found alive in the rubble. The country's disaster agency says it fears about 2,000 people were buried when a mountainside collapsed last Friday. This is much higher than the UN's estimate of about 670 victims. The UN says it has been difficult to establish an exact death toll as access to the site and those buried under the mass remain difficult. Part of that is due to complications around the search and recovery mission, which has now largely turned into a retrieval operation of bodies, various UN officials have said. "It is not a rescue mission, it is a recovery mission," Niels Kraaier from Unicef Papua New Guinea told news agency AFP. "It is very unlikely they will have survived." Only six bodies had been recovered as of Tuesday, according to local officials. Villagers have been using using shovels, sticks and their bare hands to try and remove huge rocks and rubble amid hold-ups in the arrival of heavy machinery, and also cultural sensitivities around the use of such machines like excavators near bodies. Standing in a crowd of mourners on Monday, local resident Jiman Yandam said people would keep digging manually to try and recover victims. "We don't know where the bodies are buried, but we will not give up, we will keep going," the former community leader told Reuters news agency. One woman, standing in the wreckage, described feeling helpless. "I have 18 of my family members buried under the debris and soil that I am standing on, and a lot more family members in the village I cannot count," Evit Kambu said. "But I cannot retrieve the bodies so I am standing here helplessly." The terrain remains dangerous as rocks continue to fall. Videos taken during the day have shown rocks tumbling down the mountain. “It’s still very active. The mountain is breaking up, " Sandis Tsaka, Enga Provincial Administrator told the BBC. "There’s continuous movement of rock and debris which is making our search and rescue and recovery operations a challenge," he added. The rubble remains 10m deep in some places and the mass of debris is still moving down the hillside, prompting authorities to alert nearby communities to the risk and issuing evacuation notices. "Because of the landslide, the impact area of the landslide is gradually increasing. So the homes and properties that were not affected by the original landslide area are growing every day," Mr Tsaka said. Another village close to the first-hit Yambali village was now also in danger, he said. There is also growing alarm over the risk of infection and disease in the area as the mass of bodies trapped under the rubble begin to decay. The UN had warned that currents were flowing down the hillside under the rubble. "The water that is stuck between the ground and the debris is flowing - and the bodies are starting to decay. Can you image [the impact] on more than 2,000 bodies buried under this land- unable to be removed," UN migration agency official Serhan Aktoprak told the BBC on Tuesday. Amid the treacherous conditions, aid groups say they are focusing on the immediate task of getting basic supplies like food, water and hygiene kits to residents. But there have been several barriers- including the highway to the village being blocked and damaged by the landslide. ​On Tuesday, it was reported that a bridge south of the landslide area, connecting province centers Hagen and Wabeg, had also collapsed making it more difficult for humanitarian groups delivering relief. Australia has pledged an airlift of supplies which is expected to arrive on Wednesday. Local officials say about 3,800 people had been living in the hillside village prior to the landslide, which took place around 03:00 on Friday morning and flattened more than 150 homes. The mountain's collapse has been attributed to weeks of heavy rain and other wet conditions in the area. Prime Minister James Marape had earlier in the week sent his condolences and directed national response teams to the region. The disaster comes as Mr Marape faces political pressure - parliament was expected to vote on a no-confidence motion against him on Tuesday. — BBC < Previous Page Next Page >

title: ROBBERS HIT AFDIS DEPOT, FLEE WITH US$18K
creator: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
description: Afdis depot in Kwekwe was raided by four armed robbers whofled with US$18 000.The Midweek Watch reports that the suspects disarmed aservice pistol belonging to Tsungai Marariromba who was on duty at the depotduring the wee hours of Africa Day.The four, who are still on the run went on to tieMarariromba’s legs and hands using shoelaces before they force marched thecompany driver to the
content: The Midweek Watch reports that the suspects disarmed aservice pistol belonging to Tsungai Marariromba who was on duty at the depotduring the wee hours of Africa Day. The four, who are still on the run went on to tieMarariromba’s legs and hands using shoelaces before they force marched thecompany driver to the guard room. They tied the driver’s hands and legs with shoelaces andleft one of the intruders guarding the two, while the other three proceeded tobreak the manager’s door using an iron bar. After gaining entry into the office, they blasted the safeand “took cash amounting to US$18 000 and went away,” said Midlands provincepolice spokesperson Inspector Emmanuel Mahoko.
