Güzel bir sezon beklediklerini dile getiren Topaloğlu, "Tek sıkıntımız işçilik. Depremden sonra işçi bulmakta sıkıntı yaşıyoruz. Depremin yaralarını sarmak için güzel bir sezon bekliyoruz." diye konuştu.

title: Young DJ to showcase music at Trondra gig
creator: Chris Cope
description: A TEENAGE DJ who aims to make a splash on the music scene down south in the future is hosting an event in Trondra next month as he looks to inspire more of his generation into dance culture. Read more
content: A TEENAGE DJ who aims to make a splash on the music scene down south in the future is hosting an event in Trondra next month as he looks to inspire more of his generation into dance culture. Kieran Black, who goes by the name Shamsul, will perform at the Trondra Hall on Saturday 8 June. It will be open to anyone aged 17 and above, and the event is receiving support from local youth-led charity OPEN which will help create a “safe environment” at the gig. Black, who is aged 17, said his set will feature techno, hardgroove and some of his original music. “This is kind of a debut of some of my music – I’ll be playing unreleased music that I’m working on at the moment,” he said. Black said there is also some reggae influence in his music, as well as 90s rave. He does not feel there is a lot of interest in electronic dance music in Shetland but is looking to influence his generation to get more into the scene. Black has been making music since he was around 14, and with a move to Glasgow on the cards for university he is looking to take some further steps up the DJing ladder down south. His ultimate aim is to make a “full career” out of music, and also plans to move to Toronto in Canada later down the line. Tickets for the Trondra event are available from High Level Music and will also be on the door on the night, with the music running from 10pm to 1am.

title: Nashik Fraud Crime : व्यापाऱ्याच्या नावावर ऑफर देत गंडा! वेबसाईट हॅक करीत घेतली माहिती
creator: सकाळ वृत्तसेवा
content: चांदोरी : भेंडाळी येथील व्यावसायिकांनी व्यवसाय वाढीसाठी ‘इंडिया मार्ट’ या वेबसाइटवर नोंदणी केली असून गेल्या काही महिन्यात चार ते पाच व्यावसायिकांची माहिती अज्ञाताने हॅक करून संबंधित व्यापाऱ्यांच्या नावावर विविध मालाची ऑफर देत पैसे आपल्या नावे वळते केले. (information of businessmen was hacked by unknown) त्या बदल्यात भेंडाळी येथील प्रतिष्ठित नागरिक व व्यावसायिकांचे पत्ते देत तेथून माल घेऊन जा असे सांगत परप्रांतीय व्यापाऱ्यांची फसवणूक होत आहे. या घटनांत वाढ झाली असून त्रास येथील व्यावसायिक व प्रतिष्ठित नागरिकांना होत आहे. गेल्या आठ ते नऊ महिन्यापासून हा गंभीर प्रकार घडत आहे. यामुळे स्थानिकांना परप्रांतीय व्यापाऱ्यांना तोंड देता देता नाकी नऊ आले आहे. यासंदर्भात सायबर सेलकडेही तक्रार दिली आहे. परंतु, अज्ञात व्यक्ती न सापडल्याने दररोज त्रास सहन करावा लागत आहे. चोरट्यांनी परप्रांतीय व्यापाऱ्यांना ५० लाखांवर गंडा घातल्याचा अंदाज आहे. हे मोठे रॅकेट असल्याची शक्यता वर्तवली जात आहे. भेंडाळी येथील कांदा व्यापारी व आर. बी. ट्रेडर्सचे संचालक राहुल खालकर यांना त्याचा सर्वाधिक त्रास सहन करावा लागतो आहे. सुरवातीस काही परप्रांतीय व्यक्ती पत्ता विचारत यायचे. राहुल खालकर यांना की वाटायचे की यांचा काही गैरसमज होत असावा. ज्या व्यक्तीने त्यांना फोन केलेला असायचा तो बंद असायचा. नंतर त्रास वाढायला लागला. ‘तो मी नव्हेच’ किंवा त्या मालाशी माझा काही संबंध नाही हे सांगताना व त्यांचे समाधान करायला खूप वेळ आणि त्रास सहन करावा लागत आहे. अशी होते परप्रांतीयांची फसवणूक कोणीतरी परराज्यातील व्यापाऱ्यांना संपर्क करून स्वस्तात माल देण्याचे आमिष दाखवतात. अगोदर मालाची रक्कम खात्यावर वर्ग करण्यास सांगितले जाते. त्यानंतर भेंडाळी येथील आमचा पत्ता दिला जातो. ऑनलाइन टाकलेले पैसे थेट हैदराबाद, ओडिशा, गुजरात , राजस्थानमधील बँकेत जमा होत आहेत. गुजरात, राजस्थान, ओरिसा या ठिकाणाहून मसूरदाळ, नारळ, कांदे घेण्यासाठी व्यापारी ट्रक घेऊन येतात. येथे आल्यावर त्यांची फसवणूक झाल्याचे लक्षात येते. सायबर सेलने या प्रकरणाचा तातडीने तपास करून ग्रामस्थांची या त्रासापासून सुटका करावी,अशी मागणी होत आहे. या व्यावसायिकांना त्रास.... आर. बी. ट्रेडर्स, राहुल खालकर, गुरुकृपा ट्रेडर्स, माऊली फर्निचर, सोपान खालकर, गोरख खालकर यासह भेंडाळी, महाजनपूर येथील प्रतिष्ठित नागरिकांना चोरट्यांच्या प्रतापाचा त्रास सहन करावा लागत आहे. कधीकधी वादाचे प्रसंग घडत आहे. कधीतरी बाहेरहून येणारे व्यापारी तुम्हीच पैसे घेतले म्हणून वादही घालतात. गेल्या नऊ महिन्यापासून दर आमचेकडे आठवड्याला दोन तीन व्यापारी भेंडाळी येथे येतात. "संबंधित प्रकार हा इंडिया मार्केट या वेबसाईटच्या माध्यमातून घडलेला असून फसवाणुकीचे प्रकार उघडकीस येत आहे. ज्यांची फसवणूक झाली त्यांनी स्थानिक पोलिसांकडे संपर्क केला आहे." - विकास ढोकरे, सहाय्यक पोलिस निरीक्षक, सायखेडा. "या प्रकाराचा अनेक दिवसांपासून मनस्ताप सहन करावा लागत आहे. चोर सोडून आम्हालाच त्रास सहन करावा लागतोय." - राहुल खालकर, व्यापारी, भेंडाळी.

title: Soccerladuma | Massive Multimillion-Rand Buyout Clause For Mabasa's Contract?
description: Orlando Pirates are set to reward their prolific striker, Tshegofatso Mabasa with a new contract extension and a significantly high buyout clause, the Siya crew investigates.
content: Following , the latest development comes after the striker's outstanding performance as the season's top goal scorer, where he netted a total of 16 goals. The sources have added that the new contract may include a significant R50 million buyout clause, which will apply to both local and international clubs interested in acquiring Mabasa's services. This clause is indicative of Mabasa's high value to the team and is seen as a protective measure to ensure that the club is adequately compensated should he be sought after by other teams, considering his incredible form in recent months. "All the parties involved are happy about the upcoming new deal. Yes, it's of course an improved contract because the player has proven himself that he could be the best striker in the league and that warrants an improved contract," said the Siya source. "It's not yet 100% done but the club has exercised that option which they had of keeping him for another two seasons as his contract ends in June 30 this year. But now it means he won't be going anywhere. The team exercised the two-year option plus the new two-year contract which means it runs until June 2028," the source told Soccer Laduma. Mabasa's goalscoring prowess is undisputed, as he is the reigning DStv Premiership top goal scorer. He demonstrated his talent by scoring six goals in 13 appearances for Moroka Swallows at the start of the season until December, and after returning from his loan spell, he added another 10 goals, this time in 13 games for Pirates. A second Siya source also discussed Mabasa's buyout clause and contract at Pirates. "It's not just an improved contract but also with a buyout clause of R50 million. That means whichever team wants him have to meet Pirates' demands, they won't let him go for cheap. He is the best striker currently and with interest from local teams as well as Europe it's only fair to have that buy out clause," the second source stated. The Siya crew contacted Pirates for comment but the club had not responded by the time this story was published. You must be to read and post comments.

title: Professor Of Law, Samuel Dike Faults FG Approach On LG Autonomy
creator: Opeoluwani Akintayo
description: The Federal Government had instituted a legal action against the 36 state governors at the Supreme Court over alleged misconduct in the administration of Local Government Areas.The post Professor Of Law, Samuel Dike Faults FG Approach On LG Autonomy appeared first on Channels Television.
content: A Professor of Law, Samuel Dike has faulted the Federal Government’s decision to sue the 36 states of the federation in its bid to institutionalise local government autonomy. Professor Dike who stated this while delivering the keynote address at the first South-South Leadership Conference of the Inter-Party Advisory Council (IPAC) held in Port Harcourt, argued that it is proper to solve the fundamental problem from the root, by ammending the relevant section of the constitution, rather than seeking a judicial interpretation on the matter. On the protracted discussion about resource control, Dike who is a Professor of Energy and Environmental Law, advocated that individuals be allowed to manage oil and gas resources found in non-commercial quantities in their domain, like in the United States of America where resource exploitation can be managed by landowners who pay taxes. Samuel Chisa Dike is currently Deputy Dean of the Faculty of Law at Rivers State University. He is also a Professor of Energy Law and Comparative Environmental Law. The Federal Government had instituted a legal action against the governors of the 36 states of the federation at the Supreme Court over alleged misconduct in the administration of Local Government Areas. The suit filed by the Attorney General of the Federation (AGF) and Minister of Justice, Lateef Fagbemi, is seeking full autonomy for all local government areas in the country. In suit, the Federal Government specifically prayed the court to issue an order, prohibiting state governors from embarking on unilateral, arbitrary and unlawful dissolution of democratically elected local government leaders. The governors of the 36 states were sued through their respective Attorneys General. The suit is also asking for an order permitting the funds standing in the credits of local governments to be directly channelled to them from the federation account in line with the provisions of the constitution as against the alleged unlawful joint accounts created by governors. The Federal Government also prayed to the Supreme Court for an order stopping governors from further constituting caretaker committees to run the affairs of local governments as against the constitutionally recognized and guaranteed democratic system. It equally applied for an order of injunction restraining the governors, their agents and privies from receiving, spending or tampering with funds released from the federation account for the benefit of local governments when no democratically elected local government system is put in place in the states. In the 27 grounds it listed in support of the suit, the Federal Government argued that Nigeria, as a federation, was a creation of the 1999 Constitution as amended, with the president as head of the federal executive arm, swearing on oath to uphold and give effects to provisions of the constitution. The Federal Government told the apex court that the governors represent the component states of the federation with executive governors who have also sworn to uphold the constitution at all times. It holds that the constitution of Nigeria, recognises federal, states and local governments as three tiers of government, and that the three recognised tiers of government draw funds for their operation and functioning from the federation account created by the constitution. “That by the provisions of the constitution, there must be a democratically elected local government system and that the constitution has not made provisions for any other systems of governance at the local government level other than the democratically elected local government system. “That in the face of the clear provisions of the constitution, the governors have failed and refused to put in place a democratically elected local government system even where no state of emergency has been declared to warrant the suspension of democratic institutions in the state. “That the failure of the governors to put democratically elected local government system in place, is a deliberate subversion of the 1999 constitution which they and the president have sworn to uphold. “That all efforts to make the governors comply with the dictates of the 1999 constitution in terms of putting in place, a democratically elected local government system, has not yielded any result and that to continue to disburse funds from the federation account to governors for non-existing democratically elected local government is to undermine the sanctity of the 1999 constitution. That in the face of the violations of the 1999 constitution, the federal government is not obligated under section 162 of the constitution to pay any state, funds standing to the credit of local governments where no democratically elected local government is in place.” The Supreme Court has fixed May 30 for hearing.

title: Man, woman and teenager arrested after £20k drug raid at Motherwell property
creator: news@glasgowlive.co.uk (Chiara Pollock)
description: A man, woman and teenager have been arrested and charged in connection with drugs offences following a police raid at a property in Motherwell. Heroin with an estimated street value of £20,000 has now been seized.
content: Three people have been and charged following a drugs recovery in . On Thursday, May 23, searched a property under warrant on Wood Crescent. Heroin with an estimated street value of £20,000 was seized from within. A man, aged 49, teenage male, 18, and a 42-year-old woman were arrested and charged in connection. All three are due to appear at Hamilton Sheriff Court on Friday, June 21. Police Sergeant Steven Brown: "Drugs cause misery in our communities and the public has an important role to play in helping Police Scotland target those responsible for the cultivation, supply and sale of illegal substances. “We encourage anyone with concerns or information about drugs to contact us on 101 or make a call anonymously to Crimestoppers on 0800 555 111.”

title: Andalucía strengthens ties with China to help boost economic relations
Royal fans reckon Prince William looks just like one of his kids in throwback teenage snap
creator: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Lucy Marshall)
description: Every family has lookalikes and the royals are no different - people can not get over how much William looks just like one of his children - but others see the resemblance to other family members
content: Royal fans are convinced that one royal family member looks "exactly like" Prince William as they enjoy throwback snaps of the family as teenagers. Every family tree has it's lookalikes and the monarchy are no different. Many of the royals are the spitting image of their parents or elder siblings, while some look more similar to ancestors from much older generations. Princess Beatrice has often been compared to Queen Victoria because of both of their uniquely shaped eyes and striking lip shape. Plus pictures of Prince Harry have often shown him looking a lot like his father, King Charles. Over the years, as Princess Kate and Prince William have welcomed their children Prince George , Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis, and many have often compared them to the late Queen Elizabeth II, Prince Diana, and the Middletons. Prince Harry and Meghan Markle warned they must make a choice if they want to be popular Hundreds of fans have been enjoying looking at throwback snaps of some of the most beloved royals from when they were in their teenage years, thanks to a Reddit forum names 'Royals Gossip'. Photographs include images of Queen Elizabeth and her sister Princess Margaret, Princess Ann, Princess Diana, King Charles, the Prince and Princess of Wales , as well as Prince Harry and Megan. Many thought William looked like Philip in the photo ( Image: Rex) While others saw Diana ( Image: Getty) The shot of a young Prince William shows him with a luscious long blonde locks, a shy smile, and wearing a blue check shirt. A number of people pointed out his similarity to a royal who has now passed. One individual said: "Gosh William and Philip were so attractive when young." Another added: "William looks a lot like Philip. I've always seen his mum in him but that picture of Philip is William all over." Another said: "I remember when that photo of William came out. He was so cute as a teenager." However, others think he looked just like his mum, with one person saying: "Prince William looking just like Diana at 15." People think William looks just like Charlotte in the picture ( Image: The Prince and Princess of Wales/Kensington Palace/PA Wire) Not only do they think William looks a lot like Philip and his mum, but they also have noticed a striking resemblance between William and Prince Charlotte. One individual said: " Prince William looks so much like Diana but I somehow see so much of Charlotte too in the photo." "Charlotte is her dad in girl form," wrote another. "Charlotte looks so much like William," said another. One other said she looks "exactly like" her father. Do you agree? Share your thoughts in the comments below. If you have a story get in touch at Lucy.Marshall@reachplc.com. Dunelm's 'most comfortable' hanging egg chair is 'perfect for British weather'

title: T20 World Cup: Buttler leaves English squad to be with wife for child birth
description: England captain Jos Buttler has left the squad and is set to miss the third T20 International against Pakistan on Tuesday to be with his wife for the birth of their third child.If Buttler is absent for the match in Cardiff, vice-captain Moeen Ali will take the captaincy.England leads the four-game series 1-0 after Buttler made 84 in a 23-run win at Edgbaston on Saturday. The fourth T20I is at The Oval on Thursday.The series is preparation for the T20 World Cup, with England beginning its title defence against Scotland in Barbados on June 4.Ben Duckett is likely to replace Buttler at the top of the order at Sophia Gardens.

title: Revolution Bars to proceed with restructuring after dismissing Nightcap's takeover bid
creator: newsdesk@birminghamlive.co.uk (Henry Saker-Clark, PA Deputy Business Editor)
description: The company said the Nightcap offer would not work as it was 'highly conditional'
content: The embattled hospitality group Revolution Bars has dismissed a takeover bid from its competitor Nightcap, stating the offer is "incapable of being delivered". Tameside-based Revolution, which operates the Revolucion de Cuba and Peach Pubs brands, initiated a sale process and significant restructuring efforts last month as it battles to stay afloat. As part of its survival strategy, the company has announced plans for a £12.5m capital raise and the shuttering of 18 establishments. Revolution has critiqued Nightcap's earlier proposal this month for not incorporating the planned £12.5m fundraising, suggesting instead that Nightcap would need to conduct two separate rounds of financing. The company has confirmed that funding for its proposed capital injection is already in place, with commitments from investors including ex-Pizza Express chairman Luke Johnson, pending approval from shareholders at an upcoming general meeting. Revolution has labelled the Nightcap proposition as unfeasible due to its "highly conditional" nature, reliance on assumptions about support from Nightcap's financiers, and the associated time and cost implications. However, Revolution maintains that it "remains open" to reviewing any new offers from Nightcap or other interested entities. The company stated: "Without the additional funding proposed to be raised in connection with the fundraising and without the cost savings delivered through the proposed Restructuring Plan, the Board anticipates that the group will face liquidity pressures from Q1 (July, August and September 2024) onwards." Nightcap owns 46 UK bars such as the Cocktail Club and Dirty Martini brands.

title: Xung đột Nga - Ukraine ngày 28/5: Súng phun lửa hạng nặng của Nga phá huỷ hai cứ điểm của Ukraine ở Kharkiv
description: Một nhóm binh sĩ Nga điều khiển hệ thống súng phun lửa hạng nặng TOS-2 Tosochka đã tấn công hai cứ điểm của quân đội Ukraine ở khu vực biên giới vùng Kharkiv trong một đêm, loại bỏ một số xe bọc thép.Xung đột Nga - Ukraine ngày 27/5: Nga tăng gấp đôi hoạt động chiến đấu trên mặt trận KupianskXung đột Nga - Ukraine ngày 26/5: Tổng thống Ukraine nói Nga đang tập trung nhóm quân mới gần biên giớiThủ tướng Hungary nói NATO đang chuẩn bị cho kịch bản xung đột với Nga
content: Một chỉ huy trung đội Tosochka có bí danh Kit nói với các phóng viên: “Chúng tôi đang tấn công vào Volchansk. Ban đêm, chúng tôi tấn công các cứ điểm có lực lượng dự bị của đối phương. Một số xe bọc thép đã bị loại bỏ trong cuộc tấn công vào cứ điểm đầu tiên. Trong đêm, chúng tôi tấn công một cứ điểm khác”. Theo chỉ huy này, Ukraine đã huy động lực lượng dự bị cho một cuộc phản công trong vài ngày qua. Nhưng điểm tập trung lực lượng của phía Ukraine đã bị lộ. Thời điểm Bỉ cung cấp máy bay F-16 cho Ukraine Bỉ sẽ gửi 30 máy bay chiến đấu F-16 tới Ukraine trước năm 2028. Những chiếc đầu tiên sẽ được chuyển giao vào cuối năm nay, Ngoại trưởng Bỉ Hadja Lahbib nói trên đài phát thanh Bel RTL . Nhà ngoại giao hàng đầu của Bỉ tuyên bố: “Bỉ cam kết gửi 30 chiếc F-16 tới Ukraine và những chiếc đầu tiên sẽ được giao trước cuối năm nay”. Tổng thống Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky đến thăm Brussels vào ngày 28/5. Ông sẽ được thủ tướng Bỉ và nhà vua Bỉ tiếp đón. Ngoài ra, một thỏa thuận an ninh 10 năm giữa hai nước cũng sẽ được ký kết. Ba Lan mua tên lửa tầm xa 1.000 km dành cho tiêm kích F-16 Bộ Quốc phòng Ba Lan hôm thứ Hai (27/5) thông báo nước này sẽ mua tên lửa không đối đất tầm xa JASSM-ER của Mỹ với giá 735 triệu USD. Các tên lửa tiên tiến dự kiến sẽ được trang bị cho máy bay chiến đấu F-16. Bộ Quốc phòng Ba Lan cho biết, cuộc xung đột ở Ukraine đã chứng minh tầm quan trọng của việc có thể tấn công tên lửa vào các mục tiêu ở xa tiền tuyến và tầm bắn của số tên lửa được mua là khoảng 1.000 km. Theo bộ này, Bộ trưởng Quốc phòng Wladyslaw Kosiniak-Kamysh sẽ ký hợp đồng mua tên lửa không đối đất tầm xa JASSM-ER của Mỹ trị giá 735 triệu USD vào ngày 28/5. Việc giao hàng sẽ diễn ra trong giai đoạn 2026-2030. JASSM (hay còn gọi AGM-158B JASSM) là tên lửa hành trình tầm xa do tập đoàn Lockheed Martin thiết kế và phát triển. Tên lửa được áp dụng công nghệ tàng hình, có khả năng tấn công cả mục tiêu cố định và di động. Ukraine sắp tiếp nhận chuyên gia huấn luyện Pháp Tư lệnh hàng đầu của Ukraine Oleksandr Syrskyi cho biết ông đã ký giấy tờ cho phép các chuyên gia huấn luyện quân sự Pháp sớm đến những trung tâm huấn luyện của Ukraine. “Tôi vui mừng hoan nghênh sáng kiến của Pháp về gửi huấn luyện viên đến Ukraine để đào tạo quân nhân Ukraine”, ông Oleksandr Syrskyi cho biết trên Telegram sau cuộc hội đàm trực tuyến với Bộ trưởng Quốc phòng Pháp Sebastien Lecornu. Ông Oleksandr Syrskyi nói: “Tôi đã ký các văn bản cho phép những huấn luyện viên người Pháp đầu tiên đến các trung tâm đào tạo của chúng tôi trong thời gian ngắn và làm quen với cơ sở hạ tầng cũng như nhân sự”. Ông Syrskyi không cho biết thông tin cụ thể, nhưng bày tỏ tin tưởng quyết tâm của Pháp sẽ khuyến khích các đối tác khác tham gia “dự án đầy tham vọng” này. Bộ Quốc phòng Ukraine sau đó cho biết Kiev quan tâm đến dự án tiếp nhận hướng dẫn viên quân sự nước ngoài từ tháng 2 năm nay. “Tính đến thời điểm hiện tại, chúng tôi vẫn đang thảo luận với Pháp và các nước khác về vấn đề này”, thông báo cho biết. Tổng thống Pháp Emmanuel Macron để ngỏ khả năng gửi quân đến Ukraine. Ông cũng gợi ý rằng một lĩnh vực mà quân đội phương Tây có thể trợ giúp là đào tạo người Ukraine tại Ukraine. Quân đội Nga giành thêm hai ngôi làng ở Kharkiv, Donetsk chỉ trong một ngày Bộ Quốc phòng Nga thông báo quân đội nước này đã giành quyền kiểm soát hai ngôi làng ở vùng Kharkiv của Ukraine và Cộng hoà Nhân dân tự xưng Donetsk. Theo Bộ Quốc phòng Nga, các đơn vị của cụm quân phía tây đã giành được những vị trí thuận lợi hơn và tiến vào kiểm soát làng Ivanovka. Trong khi đó, cụm quân trung tâm đã giành được làng Netailove ở Cộng hoà Nhân dân tự xưng Donetsk và cải thiện các vị trí chiến thuật của họ. Trước đó, Bộ Tổng tham mưu quân đội Ukraine cho biết trong một báo cáo vào cuối ngày 26/5 rằng quân đội nước này đã đẩy lùi một cuộc tấn công gần Ivanovka, phía đông thị trấn Kupiansk. Tối 27/5, Bộ Tổng tham mưu thông báo lực lượng Ukraine đã đẩy lùi bảy nỗ lực tiến công của Nga ở khu vực Kupiansk. Phía Ukraine thừa nhận lực lượng Nga đã đạt được "thành công một phần" tại một trong các khu vực thuộc Kupiansk, nhưng lực lượng Ukraine đang "thực hiện các biện pháp để ổn định tình hình và ngăn chặn đối phương tiến lên".

title: Pháp: Thị trấn ‘đổi bạn tình’ chấn động với bê bối biển thủ tiền cho thầy bói
description: Thị trưởng của nơi nổi tiếng với trò đổi bạn tình ở châu Âu vừa bị cảnh sát bắt giữ vì cáo buộc ông đã tiêu tiền của người nộp thuế cho thầy bói, người khẳng định có thể giúp quan chức này nói chuyện với người bố đã chết của ông.Ấn Độ: Phẫn nộ cụ ông 80 tuổi bị các cháu chôn sống vì nghi là phù thủyBốn người chết thảm vì bị hàng xóm nghi là phù thủyNgười phụ nữ bị thiêu sống vì nghi là 'phù thủy'
content: Sophia Martinez khẳng định có thể nói chuyện với người đã chết. (Ảnh: Telegraph) Nằm bên bờ Địa Trung Hải, thị trấn Adge của Pháp là nơi nổi tiếng với những bữa tiệc tình dục hoang dã, mỗi năm thu hút hàng chục ngàn cặp đôi từ khắp thế giới đến đây để chơi trò đổi bạn tình. Cái tên này giờ trở thành tâm điểm của vụ bê bối liên quan đến năng lực của “ phù thủy ” Sophia Martinez, khiến thị trưởng Gilles d'Ettore, một cựu sĩ quan cảnh sát và mật vụ, bị bắt để điều tra. Ông Ettore, người giữ chức thị trưởng Agde từ năm 2001, bị cáo buộc tham nhũng vì đã dùng một số tiền lớn từ thuế mà người dân đóng góp để đưa cho thầy bói . Bà Martinez cũng bị tạm giam để phục vụ điều tra. Bà Martinez, 44 tuổi, được cho là có khả năng nói chuyện với người chết và đã có một danh sách dài khách hàng muốn liên lạc với người thân đã khuất. “Tôi là chuyên gia về thanh lọc năng lượng cho con người và địa điểm”, trang Facebook của bà viết. Người phụ nữ này bị buộc tội biển thủ và gian lận thuế. Cảnh sát tìm thấy một lượng lớn tiền mặt tại nhà bà. Thị trưởng Gilles d'Ettore bị cáo buộc biển thủ công quỹ để đưa cho thầy bói. (Ảnh: Telegraph) Khi thị trưởng 55 tuổi yêu cầu bà liên lạc với người cha đã khuất của ông, người phụ nữ này có thể bắt chước giọng nói của người đã chết với mức độ tương đồng gây kinh ngạc. Ông Ettore cũng thường xuyên nhận được các cuộc gọi nặc danh từ một người tự xưng là Tổng lãnh thiên thần Michael, vị thánh bảo trợ của Agde, người nói với “giọng khàn khàn từ thế giới bên kia” để bảo ông “hãy bảo vệ Sophia và những người thân yêu của cô ấy”. Thị trưởng yêu quý Martinez đến mức coi người phụ nữ này như con gái mình. Ông thậm chí còn dẫn người này vào lễ đường trong đám cưới thứ ba của bà vào năm ngoái. Chi phí tổ chức đám cưới ước tính 80.000 euro, được cho là do ông Ettore chi trả. Để trả tiền cho Martinez, ông Ettore bị cáo buộc đã tranh thủ sự hỗ trợ của các nhân viên thành phố và các công ty có liên quan đến tòa thị chính, thông qua hóa đơn giả. Martinez được tặng căn bếp mới, những chuyến đi đến Polynesia và Thái Lan, cùng tiền học phí cho 2 trong 6 đứa con của bà. Sau khi vợ cũ của ông Ettore khiếu nại vì cho rằng ông bị “mê hoặc” để biển thủ quỹ hội đồng, cảnh sát lắp thiết bị nghe lén và rất ngạc nhiên trước kỹ năng giả giọng của người phụ nữ này. Cảnh sát phát hiện ra rằng, bằng cách bắt chước giọng nói khàn khàn giống nam giới, Martinez đã thành công trong việc lừa người khác nghĩ rằng họ đang nói chuyện với người âm .

title: Nga tấn công sân bay Zaporozhye bằng tên lửa Kh-59
description: Bộ Tư lệnh tác chiến Nam Ukraine ngày 27/5 xác nhận quân đội Nga đã tấn công nhà ga sân bay Zaporozhye bằng tên lửa hành trình Kh-59. Không có ghi nhận về thương vong. Xe tăng T-90 bốc cháy ngùn ngụt sau cuộc tấn công của máy bay không người lái UkraineHé lộ vũ khí giúp Ukraine chống lại hệ thống tác chiến điện tử của NgaTình báo Ukraine: Máy bay không người lái tấn công 'ô hạt nhân' Voronezh có tầm hoạt động lên tới 1.800 kmXuất hiện video cường kích Su-34 Nga thả bom dẫn đường mới ở Kharkiv
content: Cùng ngày, văn phòng công tố Ukraine đã mở một cuộc điều tra về hậu quả của cuộc tấn công. Hình ảnh nhà ga của sân bay quốc tế Zaporozhye sau cuộc tấn công bằng tên lửa của Nga. Kh-59 là tên lửa không - đối - đất, được phát triển từ những năm 1970 và đưa vào sử dụng từ năm 1980 đến nay. Kh-59 được trang bị một động cơ phản lực nhiên liệu rắn. Mỗi tên lửa có chiều dài 4,7 m; đường kính 0,35 m với trọng lượng phóng lên đến 930 kg và tầm bắn 200 km. Kh-59 mang đầu đạn nặng 320 kg giúp nó có thể phá hủy một công trình cơ sở hạ tầng cỡ lớn. Kh-59 sở hữu hệ thống nhắm mục tiêu hiện đại. Tọa độ và hình ảnh mục tiêu có thể được cung cấp cho tên lửa trước khi phóng. Sau khi phóng tên lửa được sử dụng dẫn đường quán tính. Ở giai đoạn cuối, cách vị trí mục tiêu khoảng 10 km, một hệ thống hướng dẫn TV được kích hoạt, phi công xác định và khóa mục tiêu, đảm bảo sai số dưới 3 m.

title: Mưa lớn kèm lốc xoáy, lở đá làm 1 học sinh bị thương ở Bình Phước
description: Thông tin từ Ban chỉ huy Phòng chống thiên tai và tìm kiếm cứu nạn cứu hộ huyện Bù Đăng (Bình Phước) cho biết, cơn mưa lớn đã làm cây ngã, sạt lở gây ngập cục bộ và làm một người bị thương.Miền Trung, Tây Nguyên tiếp tục mưa lớnNam Bộ, miền Trung sắp mưa lớnMưa lớn trút xuống TPHCM lúc giữa trưaMưa lớn, nhiều đường phố Đà Nẵng thành sông, giao thông hỗn loạnNguyên nhân bung nắp hố ga trong cơn mưa lớn ở khu vực chợ Thủ Đức Cây xanh bật gốc, giao thông rối loạn trong cơn mưa lớn chiều nay ở TPHCM
content: Chiều 28/5, Ban chỉ huy Phòng chống thiên tai và tìm kiếm cứu nạn cứu hộ huyện Bù Đăng (Bình Phước) cho biết, cơn mưa lớn kéo theo lốc xoáy bất ngờ quét qua đồi Dốc Đỏ (thuộc thôn 5, xã Đăng Hà) sáng cùng ngày. Theo đó, cơn mưa lớn kèm theo lốc xoáy, kéo dài khoảng 1 giờ quét qua địa phận xã Đăng Hà, đoạn qua Km23 chân đồi Dốc Đỏ, khiến một cây lớn bị gãy đổ, chắn ngang tuyến đường ĐT.755B (Sao Bọng - Đăng Hà), gây ách tắc giao thông làm nhiều phương tiện phải dừng lại. Thời điểm này, một phụ huynh điều khiển xe máy chở con đi học, khi đi gần đến khu vực cây gãy đổ, bất ngờ đá trên đồi Dốc Đỏ rơi văng xuống đường trúng vào xe khiến 2 mẹ con bị té ngã, cháu bé bị thương nhẹ. Mưa lớn làm cây ngã đổ Mưa lớn gây ngập cục bộ Chính quyền xã Đăng Hà đã cử lực lượng dân quân thường trực đến dọn cây đổ, thông báo người dân trên địa bàn tiếp tục khắc phục thiệt hại, đảm bảo an toàn lưu thông cho người dân. Cơn mưa lớn khiến mực nước ở khu vực suối Đắk Woa (thị trấn Đức Phong, huyện Bù Đăng) dâng cao. Nhiều nhà của các hộ dân ven hai bờ suối nước đã tràn vào sân. Ban chỉ huy phòng chống thiên tai và tìm kiếm cứu nạn cứu hộ cùng các lực lượng huyện Bù Đăng đã tổ chức các điểm chốt chặn, hướng dẫn người dân đi đường tránh đợi nước rút. Đồng thời khuyến cáo người dân, đặc biệt các hộ dân sống khu vực ven sông, suối, hồ đập cảnh giác để kịp thời di dời đến nơi an toàn khi có tình huống xấu xảy ra nhằm hạn chế thấp nhất thiệt hại.

title: Nước nào đang là chủ nợ lớn nhất thế giới?
description: Với tài sản ròng bên ngoài đạt mức 471,3 nghìn tỷ yên, Nhật Bản dẫn đầu danh sách chủ nợ lớn nhất thế giới. Theo sau là Đức và Trung Quốc với giá trị lần lượt 454,8 nghìn tỷ yên và 412,7 nghìn tỷ yên.Giá vàng thế giới ‘bất động’Giá vàng thế giới phục hồi sau chuỗi ngày lao dốc Giá vàng thế giới giảm mạnh nhất kể từ đầu năm
content: Ngày 28/5, Bộ Tài chính Nhật Bản thông báo tài sản ròng bên ngoài Nhật Bản tăng lên mức kỷ lục là 471,3 nghìn tỷ yên (khoảng 3 nghìn tỷ USD) vào năm 2023, đánh dấu năm thứ sáu tăng liên tiếp. Bộ Tài chính nước này cho biết sự suy giảm của đồng yên cùng hoạt động mua lại các công ty ở nước ngoài làm tăng giá trị tài sản nước ngoài. Mỗi năm, mức tăng giá trị tài sản ròng bên ngoài do chính phủ, doanh nghiệp và cá nhân Nhật Bản nắm giữ lên đến 51.000 tỷ yên. Nhờ đó, Nhật Bản tiếp tục giữ vị trí chủ nợ hàng đầu thế giới. Cơ quan nhà nước của Nhật đồng thời liệt kê Đức là chủ nợ lớn thứ hai thế giới với 454,8 nghìn tỷ yên, Trung Quốc đứng thứ ba với tài sản ròng bên ngoài là 412,7 nghìn tỷ yên, tính đến cuối năm 2023. Ngoài ra, Bộ Tài chính Nhật Bản thông báo tổng tài sản bên ngoài của Nhật đạt mức 1.488 nghìn tỷ yên, trong khi nợ nước ngoài là 1.017 nghìn tỷ yên. Chính quyền Nhật Bản đồng thời công bố dữ liệu số dư tài khoản vãng lai sửa đổi. Trong cả năm 2023, thặng dư tài khoản vãng lai của quốc gia này là 21,4 nghìn tỷ yên, cao hơn con số ước tính trước đó là 20,6 nghìn tỷ yên. Hình ảnh người dân Nhật tại khu mua sắm sầm uất tại Tokyo, Nhật Bản. Cùng ngày, Ngân hàng Trung ương Nhật Bản công bố giá dịch vụ doanh nghiệp Nhật Bản trong tháng 4 ghi nhận mức tăng nhanh nhất kể từ đầu năm 2015. Chỉ số giá dịch vụ doanh nghiệp (CSPI) đã tăng 2,8% so với cùng kỳ, sau mức tăng 2,4% của tháng trước. Trong tháng 4, giá dịch vụ tăng 0,7%, chậm lại so với mức 0,9% của tháng 3. Chỉ số CSPI được các nhà hoạch định chính sách theo dõi chặt chẽ nhằm tìm kiếm mức lương ổn định thúc đẩy lạm phát do nhu cầu. Đây điều kiện tiên quyết để Ngân hàng Trung ương Nhật Bản tăng lãi suất nhằm chấm dứt tình trạng lãi suất âm. Từ lâu, mức lương thấp so với chất lượng sống tại Nhật Bản là trở ngại cho việc thúc đẩy tiêu dùng bền vững, tăng trưởng kinh tế. Tuy nhiên, nhiều doanh nghiệp gần đây thực hiện đợt tăng lương lớn nhất sau nhiều thập kỷ. Điều này được các chuyên gia cho là lý do dẫn đến việc Ngân hàng Trung ương Nhật Bản thay đổi chính sách. Theo Reuters , Ngân hàng Trung ương Nhật Bản đang phát tín hiệu tăng lãi suất do giá trị đồng yên suy giảm, tình trạng kinh tế không ổn định.

title: Bé An 'Đất phương Nam' công khai bạn gái mới
description: Sau lần đổ vỡ hôn nhân năm 2014 và cuộc tình kéo dài 3 năm, Hùng Thuận thông báo có bạn gái mới. Đệ nhất phu nhân Nigeria chỉ trích Meghan Markle mặc hởCannes 2024 và vấn nạn mua bán tình dục trên du thuyền
content: Ngày 28/5, diễn viên Hùng Thuận xác nhận thông tin đang hẹn hò. Người yêu mới của "bé An" Đất phương Nam tên Tuệ Tâm , không hoạt động trong lĩnh vực giải trí. "Bạn gái tôi làm kinh doanh. Tôi không muốn chia sẻ quá nhiều, tránh ảnh hưởng cuộc sống riêng của cả hai", Hùng Thuận chia sẻ. Trên trang cá nhân, Hùng Thuận đổi trạng thái Độc thân sang Đang hẹn hò với Tuệ Tâm. Ngoài thông tin trên, diễn viên Đất phương Nam không chia sẻ ảnh chụp cùng người yêu. Bạn gái Hùng Thuận cũng sống kín tiếng, ít cập nhật hình ảnh. Từ tháng 3, Tuệ Tâm chia sẻ nhiều thông tin, hoạt động kinh doanh của bạn trai. Hình ảnh bạn gái mới của Hùng Thuận. Dưới bài đăng công khai đang hẹn hò của Hùng Thuận, nhiều đồng nghiệp như Kha Ly, Nguyệt Ánh, Tú Vi, Hiền Trang ... (đóng cùng anh trong Cổng mặt trời ) để lại bình luận chúc mừng nam diễn viên có tình yêu mới. Hùng Thuận từng trải qua hôn nhân, sau đó ly hôn năm 2014. Anh đang sống cùng con trai 13 tuổi. Khoảng năm 2018, nam diễn viên hẹn hò một nữ DJ nhưng chia tay sau ba năm gắn bó. Trong một lần phỏng vấn, diễn viên Dòng đời chia sẻ ngày trước anh nóng nảy nên khó hòa hợp trong chuyện hôn nhân. Hùng Thuận đồng thời nói anh không hẳn lận đận trong chuyện tình cảm, yêu hay chấm dứt tình cảm đều là duyên, không thể cưỡng cầu. Nam diễn viên cho rằng đàn ông phải tập trung cho sự nghiệp, sau đó mới tính chuyện tình cảm. Hùng Thuận sinh năm 1983, nổi tiếng với vai diễn bé An trong bộ phim truyền hình Đất phương Nam (1997) của đạo diễn Nguyễn Vinh Sơn . Sau hiệu ứng Đất phương Nam , anh lấn sân sang lĩnh vực âm nhạc, đi diễn ở các tỉnh miền Tây nhưng không quá thành công. Hùng Thuận sau đó trở lại với diễn xuất, tham gia các phim như Cổng mặt trời, Trúng số, Tiếng tơ đồng ... Những năm gần đây, Hùng Thuận tập trung kinh doanh bất động sản.

title: Bộ trưởng Tài chính: Tăng tạm hoãn xuất cảnh để thu hồi nợ thuế
description: Bộ trưởng Tài chính Hồ Đức Phớc vừa có đề nghị gửi các địa phương yêu cầu thành lập ban chỉ đạo đôn đốc thu hồi nợ đọng thuế và tiền sử dụng đất, tiền thuê đất trên địa bàn. Cơ quan thuế đẩy mạnh thực hiện biện pháp tạm hoãn xuất cảnh.Bị cấm xuất cảnh vì nợ thuế: Có oan?Trường Đại học Hà Hoa Tiên đứng đầu danh sách nợ thuế ở Hà NamDoanh nghiệp nợ thuế có dấu hiệu gia tăng
content: Bộ trưởng Bộ Tài chính vừa có công văn gửi Bí thư Tỉnh ủy, Thành ủy; Chủ tịch UBND các tỉnh, thành phố trực thuộc Trung ương đề nghị phối hợp chỉ đạo trong công tác xử lý thu hồi nợ thuế . Theo Bộ trưởng Hồ Đức Phớc , 4 tháng đầu năm, nợ đọng thuế tại nhiều địa phương có xu hướng tăng cao, đặc biệt các khoản nợ tiền sử dụng đất, tiền thuê đất. Trước tình hình này, Bộ Tài chính đề nghị thành lập ban chỉ đạo đôn đốc thu hồi nợ đọng thuế và tiền sử dụng đất, tiền thuê đất trên địa bàn tỉnh/thành phố. Ban chỉ đạo rà soát danh sách người nộp thuế có nợ thuế lớn trên địa bàn, xác định biện pháp thu hồi cụ thể đối với từng người nộp thuế, định kỳ hàng tháng báo cáo kết quả hoạt động với UBND tỉnh, thành phố và Bộ Tài chính (qua Tổng cục Thuế). Bộ trưởng Tài chính đề nghị các địa phương thành lập ban chỉ đạo đôn đốc thu hồi nợ đọng thuế và tiền sử dụng đất, tiền thuê đất. Bộ trưởng Tài chính cũng đề nghị người đứng đầu các tỉnh, thành phố chỉ đạo cơ quan liên quan trên địa bàn ( Ngân hàng thương mại, tổ chức tín dụng, Công an, Thông tin truyền thông, Quy hoạch kiến trúc, Kế hoạch đầu tư, Tài nguyên môi trường, Tài chính, Xây dựng, Quản lý xuất nhập cảnh...) phối hợp chặt chẽ với cơ quan thuế áp dụng các biện pháp cưỡng chế theo quy định của Luật Quản lý thuế để thu hồi nợ đọng thuế. Đối với các khoản nợ tiền sử dụng đất , tiền thuê đất, tiền cấp quyền khai thác khoáng sản dây dưa kéo dài, các địa phương cần tập trung tháo gỡ khó khăn, vướng mắc (nếu có) để sớm xử lý thu hồi nợ thuế. Với các dự án chây ỳ, nợ thuế kéo dài, không thực hiện nghĩa vụ tài chính với nhà nước, ban chỉ đạo tham mưu cho UBND tỉnh, thành phố thực hiện việc thu hồi đất. Cơ quan thuế và các cơ quan liên quan cũng cần phối hợp cung cấp thông tin để triển khai kịp thời, hiệu quả các biện pháp cưỡng chế thu hồi nợ thuế; công khai thông tin người nộp thuế chây ỳ nợ thuế trên các phương tiện thông tin đại chúng theo quy định của pháp luật; đẩy mạnh áp dụng biện pháp tạm hoãn xuất nhập cảnh đối với cá nhân, cá nhân là người đại diện pháp luật của người nộp thuế là doanh nghiệp đang bị cưỡng chế thi hành quyết định hành chính về quản lý thuế chưa hoàn thành nghĩa vụ nộp thuế.

title: Tổng Giám đốc Công ty VPF nói gì về những phàn nàn liên quan đến lịch thi đấu V-League?
description: Trong cuộc trao đổi với báo Tiền Phong, ông Nguyễn Minh Ngọc – Tổng Giám đốc Công ty VPF, Trưởng Ban tổ chức các Giải bóng đá chuyên nghiệp Quốc gia 2023/24 cho biết, lịch thi đấu V-League 2023/24 được xây dựng dựa trên ý kiến đóng góp của chính các CLB tham gia giải đấu. Không được triệu tập, trung vệ nhập tịch của ĐT Thái Lan buông lời khó nghe với HLV IshiiMạch toàn thắng của TP.HCM I ở giải bóng đá nữ VĐQG 2024 bị chặn đứngVì sao VFF có thể áp tình tiết tăng nặng khi xử phạt ông Vũ Tiến Thành?AFC xếp hạng các giải VĐQG: Việt Nam thứ 3, Indonesia thứ 6 Đông Nam Á
content: Thời gian qua, câu chuyện về lịch thi đấu với mật độ tương đối dày của V-League 2023/24 là chủ đề được bàn tán. Như đã biết, trong 23 ngày kể từ 3/5 đến 26/5, 6 vòng đấu với 42 trận đã diễn ra nhằm đảm bảo giải đấu sẽ kết thúc đúng hẹn ngày 30/6. Câu chuyện được đẩy lên cao khi sau trận đấu giữa CLB TPHCM và LPBank HAGL ngày 25/5, HLV Vũ Tiến Thành đã công kích Ban tổ chức giải về việc "xếp lịch đá dồn dập cả giữa tuần" và "tổ chức cho có". Trong ngày HLV của CLB TPHCM nhận án phạt vì những phát ngôn “gây ảnh hưởng nghiêm trọng tới hình ảnh của bóng đá Việt Nam”, ông Nguyễn Minh Ngọc – Tổng Giám đốc Công ty VPF , Trưởng Ban tổ chức các Giải bóng đá chuyên nghiệp Quốc gia 2023/24, đã có cuộc trao đổi với phóng viên báo Tiền Phong về lịch thi đấu. Theo ông Nguyễn Minh Ngọc, V-League 2023/24 là mùa giải đặc biệt, bởi đây là mùa đầu tiên các giải bóng đá chuyên nghiệp quốc gia chuyển đổi khung thời gian thi đấu đồng bộ theo tiêu chuẩn của AFC. Cùng với đó là hệ quả của đại dịch Covid-19 để lại từ những năm trước, khiến một số giải đấu châu lục quan trọng bị lùi lịch thi đấu, cộng thêm quãng nghỉ FIFA Days, AFC Asian Cup, U23 Châu Á, Tết nguyên đán... khiến khung thời gian tổ chức giải bị bó hẹp. HLV Vũ Tiến Thành nhiều lần công kích VFF và VPF, trong đó có vấn đề lịch thi đấu. Nhằm có sự đồng thuận cao trong việc sắp xếp lịch thi đấu, Tổng Giám đốc VPF cho biết "Ban tổ chức giải đã gửi văn bản về từng CLB, lấy ý kiến tham khảo, sau đó tổ chức hội thảo công tác sắp lịch thi đấu, một diễn đàn để các CLB góp ý, trực tiếp nêu ý kiến trước khi đi đến thống nhất về khung thời gian thi đấu". "Về thời gian thi đấu cụ thể của từng giai đoạn, Công ty VPF lên nhiều phương án, trình duyệt Ban chấp hành VFF, nơi có đại diện của 7 CLB V.League, xem xét, lựa chọn phương án tối ưu. Sau khi được phê duyệt phương án, Công ty VPF mới ban hành chính thức", ông Nguyễn Minh Ngọc nói. Về mùa giải 2024/25 sắp tới, ông Nguyễn Minh Ngọc cho biết "VPF sẽ tính toán phương án lịch tối ưu để đảm bảo đáp ứng các yêu cầu đề ra, từ đó các CLB sẽ căn cứ kế hoạch từ đầu để có những chuẩn bị hợp lý về chiến thuật, đáp ứng được chất lượng và mục tiêu CLB đặt ra". "VPF luôn mong rằng các CLB có sự chia sẻ và góp ý xây dựng với Ban tổ chức giải, tránh xảy ra những phản ứng gây ồn ào không đáng có về phương án lịch thi đấu trong thời gian giải đấu diễn ra", Tổng Giám đốc VPF chia sẻ.

title: Doanh nghiệp công nghiệp hỗ trợ mong được trợ lực vốn
description: Theo các chuyên gia và doanh nghiệp, để có thể đổi mới công nghệ, đáp ứng yêu cầu của đối tác, nhà mua hàng... vốn cho đầu tư và phát triển vẫn là nhu cầu cấp thiết của các doanh nghiệp ngành công nghiệp hỗ trợ từ trước đến nay. Tuy nhiên, muốn được trợ vốn, hỗ trợ lãi suất không phải doanh nghiệp nào cũng có thể tiếp cận được.Gỡ điểm nghẽn để công nghiệp hỗ trợ tăng giá trị trong chuỗi cung ứngDoanh nghiệp công nghiệp hỗ trợ khát đất sản xuấtPhát triển công nghiệp hỗ trợ còn nhiều điểm nghẽn
content: Nhu cầu có nhưng... Nhờ được trợ vốn từ chương trình kích cầu đầu tư của TPHCM mà Công ty TNHH Cao su Đức Minh ở huyện Hóc Môn, TPHCM (doanh nghiệp chuyên thiết kế, chế tạo màng hơi dùng trong công nghiệp sản xuất lốp, lốp xe nâng, cao su kỹ thuật...) không chỉ đầu tư thêm trang thiết bị, máy móc mà còn mở rộng tệp khách hàng trong và ngoài nước như Nhật Bản, Hàn Quốc... Theo ông Nguyễn Quốc Anh, Giám đốc Công ty Đức Minh, doanh nghiệp được thành phố duyệt vay 8 tỷ đồng nên đã đầu tư thêm các dây chuyền, thiết bị hiện đại và tăng được 50% công suất sản xuất. “Lãi suất ngân hàng vốn là nỗi lo của nhiều doanh nghiệp quy mô nhỏ và vừa hoạt động trong lĩnh vực công nghiệp hỗ trợ khi có kế hoạch đầu tư. Do đó, khi thành phố có chương trình hỗ trợ phần lãi vay này là rất tốt để doanh nghiệp mạnh dạn đầu tư mở rộng sản xuất cũng như thay đổi thiết bị công nghệ hiện đại hơn. Với khoản vay nói trên trong vòng 7 năm, chúng tôi được chương trình hỗ trợ khoảng 2,6 tỷ đồng tiền lãi vay”, ông Quốc Anh chia sẻ. Cũng nhờ được hỗ trợ vay vốn kích cầu từ chương trình hỗ trợ doanh nghiệp của TPHCM những năm trước, Công ty TNHH Cơ khí Thương mại Nhật Long (TP Thủ Đức) đã “lột xác” khi thực hiện tái cơ cấu, nâng cao năng lực, thiết bị, công nghệ và “vượt bão” thành công trong giai đoạn khó khăn nhất từ ảnh hưởng của nền kinh tế thế giới. Ông Nguyễn Ngô Long, Chủ tịch HĐQT Công ty Nhật Long bộc bạch, từ một doanh nghiệp nhỏ, công ty của ông đã dần trở thành đối tác cung cấp phụ tùng, linh kiện công nghiệp cho các doanh nghiệp FDI (có vốn đầu tư nước ngoài) và các nhà máy trong nước, giảm thiểu phụ thuộc vào sản phẩm nhập khẩu. Tuy nhiên, theo phản ánh của các doanh nghiệp, không phải đơn vị nào cũng dễ dàng tiếp cận vốn vay với lãi suất ưu đãi, đặc biệt trong lĩnh vực công nghiệp hỗ trợ. Có nhu cầu nhập khẩu nguyên phụ liệu như vải, dây khóa kéo, nút... trong lĩnh vực dệt may, Công ty May mặc Thanh Niên (quận Tân Bình) tìm hiểu nguồn vốn kích cầu, gói vay ưu đãi lãi suất nhưng sau một thời gian dài mãi vẫn không vay được vốn. “Chúng tôi là doanh nghiệp vừa và nhỏ, mặc dù có đơn hàng xuất khẩu nhưng chủ yếu vẫn gia công cho bên thứ ba. Bên cạnh đó, uy tín, thương hiệu vẫn chưa được nhiều người biết đến nên càng khó tiếp cận các chương trình cho vay vốn giá rẻ”, ông Lê Thanh, đại diện doanh nghiệp chia sẻ. Theo ông Nguyễn Thành Hưng, Giám đốc Công ty Bình Hưng chuyên gia công các chi tiết cơ khí chính xác, các doanh nghiệp công nghiệp hỗ trợ khi muốn phát triển đều có nhu cầu vay vốn. Tuy nhiên, đa số doanh nghiệp vẫn chưa thể tiếp cận được các nguồn vốn ưu đãi do nhiều điều kiện được đưa ra khiến doanh nghiệp nhỏ và vừa không thể đáp ứng. “Để tiếp cận được nguồn vốn, trước hết doanh nghiệp phải phát huy nguồn lực tự có, sau đó đề ra kế hoạch phát triển bền vững theo từng giai đoạn cụ thể, đáp ứng được chất lượng đầu ra, giá thành sản phẩm và năng lực sản xuất... Đây là những tiêu chí giúp ngân hàng, tổ chức tài chính yên tâm hỗ trợ khoản vay, đồng thời cũng là điều kiện để đối tác tin tưởng, ký kết hợp tác”, ông Hưng chia sẻ. Tìm cách hỗ trợ doanh nghiệp được vay ưu đãi Đại diện Sở Công Thương TPHCM cho biết, đơn vị vừa có Tờ trình số 2516 gửi UBND TPHCM về kế hoạch hỗ trợ các doanh nghiệp thuộc lĩnh vực công nghiệp hỗ trợ năm 2024. Theo đó, Sở dự kiến tiếp nhận và xử lý hồ sơ đăng ký tham gia chương trình hỗ trợ lãi suất của thành phố đối với 5 dự án. Để được hỗ trợ lãi suất vay, doanh nghiệp phải đáp ứng đủ các điều kiện nghiêm ngặt được quy định tại Nghị quyết số 09 quy định về hỗ trợ lãi suất đối với các dự án đầu tư được Công ty Đầu tư Tài chính nhà nước TPHCM cho vay thuộc lĩnh vực ưu tiên phát triển kinh tế - xã hội trên địa bàn thành phố. Cụ thể, doanh nghiệp phải có sản phẩm được công nhận là sản phẩm công nghiệp và công nghiệp hỗ trợ tiêu biểu của TPHCM; ngành nghề sản xuất phải thuộc lĩnh vực ưu tiên phát triển kinh tế - xã hội trên địa bàn thành phố. Mức hỗ trợ lãi suất chỉ áp dụng đối với dự án có mức vay tối đa là 200 tỷ đồng, khi đó ngân sách thành phố sẽ hỗ trợ lãi suất tối đa 70% đối với phần đầu tư xây dựng công trình. Riêng đối với phần vốn đầu tư công nghệ và thiết bị (được tính toán phù hợp quy định) được hỗ trợ lãi suất tối đa 85%. Mức lãi suất được hỗ trợ tối đa không vượt quá mức lãi suất huy động tiết kiệm bằng tiền đồng Việt Nam kỳ hạn 12 tháng (trả lãi cuối kỳ) bình quân của 4 ngân hàng thương mại gồm Agribank, BIDV, Vietcombank, VietinBank cộng thêm phí quản lý 2%/năm. “TPHCM cũng sẽ hỗ trợ doanh nghiệp quảng bá các sản phẩm tại triển lãm về công nghiệp và công nghiệp hỗ trợ năm 2024; đào tạo chuyển đổi số; đào tạo về hệ thống quản lý chất lượng theo tiêu chuẩn ISO 9001:2015; tập huấn nâng cao năng lực marketing cho doanh nghiệp...”, đại diện Sở Công Thương TPHCM cho hay. Theo đại diện Sở Công Thương TPHCM, thành phố xác định công nghiệp hỗ trợ là lĩnh vực ưu tiên cần tập trung phát triển để giúp nâng cao năng lực cạnh tranh, tăng khả năng thu hút đầu tư trực tiếp nước ngoài, đẩy mạnh chuyển giao công nghệ, thúc đẩy sự phát triển của các doanh nghiệp nhỏ và vừa trong nước. Hiện các doanh nghiệp trong lĩnh vực này mong muốn được hỗ trợ cơ chế vay vốn như tiếp cận lãi suất ưu đãi và dùng tài sản thế chấp là máy móc thay vì nhà đất.

title: [경북포럼] 의사와 수의사 그리고 나무 의사
creator: 이상식 포항지역위원회 위원·시인
description: 오랜 수렵채집사회 때문일까. 인간은 푸름을 갈망하는 DNA를 가졌다. 텃밭을 일구고 산하를 찾는 인파를 보면 그런 생각이 든다. 학자들 연구에 따르면 자연을 접하는 것은 폭넓은 혜택을 준다. 심지어 자연을 찍은 동영상도 도움이 된다.녹지가 보이는 병실에 입원한 환자는 회복이 빠르다. 서구 의사는 일부 환자에게 ‘녹색 처방전’을 발급한다. 공원과 시골길 산책을 권하는 형식을 취한다. 일본 의사는 그냥 숲에서 빈둥거리는 삼림욕을 즐기라는 진단도 내린다. 요컨대 인간은 대자연을 가까이하면 심신이 한층 건강해진다.식물은 다양한 형태로 나눈
content: 이상식 포항지역위원회 위원·시인 오랜 수렵채집사회 때문일까. 인간은 푸름을 갈망하는 DNA를 가졌다. 텃밭을 일구고 산하를 찾는 인파를 보면 그런 생각이 든다. 학자들 연구에 따르면 자연을 접하는 것은 폭넓은 혜택을 준다. 심지어 자연을 찍은 동영상도 도움이 된다. 녹지가 보이는 병실에 입원한 환자는 회복이 빠르다. 서구 의사는 일부 환자에게 ‘녹색 처방전’을 발급한다. 공원과 시골길 산책을 권하는 형식을 취한다. 일본 의사는 그냥 숲에서 빈둥거리는 삼림욕을 즐기라는 진단도 내린다. 요컨대 인간은 대자연을 가까이하면 심신이 한층 건강해진다. 식물은 다양한 형태로 나눈다. 대개 목본류와 초본류로 분류하고 목본류는 다시 관목류와 교목류로 구분한다. 환경부 조사에 의하면 한국인이 가장 선호하는 초본류는 민들레이고 목본류는 소나무였다. 특히 소나무는 사시사철 푸른 속성 덕분에 선비의 지조를 상징한 침엽수다. 침엽수는 바늘잎 숫자로 수종이 나뉜다. 소나무는 잎이 2개씩이고 리기다소나무는 3개씩 달렸다. 또한 잣나무는 잎이 5개씩 모였고 낙엽송은 수십 개의 잎이 무더기로 생겼다. 낙엽송은 ‘낙엽이 지는 소나무’란 뜻이다. 하늘에서 지구를 바라보면 초록빛 띠가 상단을 두른 형태로 보인다. 이를 러시아는 ‘타이가’로 칭하고 캐나다는 ‘북방침엽수림’이라 부른다. 지구상 나무들 3분의 2가 서식하는 지대다. 숲의 절반은 러시아 영토. 북반구 짧은 여름철 동안 산소 배출과 이산화탄소 흡수로 지구 대기에 영향을 미친다. 타이가 너머 수목한계선인 북위 65도가 되면 황량한 불모지 툰드라가 펼쳐지는 극지방. 비가 내리지 않으며 겨울이 길고 춥다. 적도 일원에 있는 열대우림은 제일 풍요로운 생물체 서식지. 지구상 육지 면적 3%에 불과하나 동식물 종류 절반이 산다. 브라질 아마존 우림은 ‘지구의 허파’라 불릴 정도로 중요하다. 한국은 곳곳에 전설의 나무가 자란다. 어느 대사가 지팡이로 쓰던 나무가 자라 거목이 됐다는 내용. 이런 전승은 황당한 얘기는 아니다. 흔히 꺾꽂이라 칭하는 식물 번식은 그 개연성이 다분하다. 나뭇가지를 지팡이로 삼았다가 땅에 꽂았다면 순이 나와서 자랄 가능성이 있지 않겠는가. 국제학술지 ‘네이처 식물’에 의하면 작금 바오바브나무가 사라지는 중이다. 아프리카 최고령 바오바브나무 13그루 가운데 9그루가 쓰러졌다고 전한다. 가뭄으로 거대한 몸체를 유지할 수분을 흡수하지 못한 탓이라 여긴다. 이 나무는 생텍쥐페리의 동화 ‘어린 왕자’로 널리 알려졌다. 어린 왕자는 말한다. 바오바브나무는 뿌리로 별에 구멍을 뚫는 나쁜 식물이기에 뽑아야 한다고. 모든 유기체는 생로병사를 거친다. 누구도 예외가 없는 대자연의 법칙이다. 의사는 생명체가 건강한 삶을 살도록 돕는다. 사람과 동물을 치료하는 의사와 수의사는 인류 역사와 궤를 함께한다. 차마고도 마방들 리더인 마궈토는 말도 치료한 수의사다. 한데 나무 의사는 다소 생소한 개념이 아닌가 싶다. 이는 나무 치료를 담당하는 전문가를 이른다. 일정 기간 교육과 국가시험을 통과해야 자격증이 주어진다. 보통 식물은 동물보다도 경시되는 경향이 있다. 사실은 인류의 생존에 소중한 동반자. 생명의 공기인 산소를 내뿜고 햇빛 에너지를 동물이 섭취할 영양소로 바꾼다. 식물은 나무병원의 나무 의사 보호를 받을 가치가 충분하다.

title: Fußballerin Annalena Breitenbach aus Westsachsen und ihr Abschied vom FC Carl Zeiss Jena nach Maß
content: Die ehemalige Erstliga-Spielerin, die aus Glauchau stammt, hat ihre Laufbahn verletzungsbedingt beendet. Zur Verabschiedung konnte sie mit ihren Teamkameradinnen groß feiern. Registrieren und testen. Jetzt registrieren und 30 Tage gratis testen. Schon Abonnent? Melden Sie sich mit Ihren Zugangsdaten an. Wie die Polizei am Dienstag mitteilte, wurde ein 46-Jähriger nach... Nicole Woldmann aus Langenleuba-Oberhain und Johanna Seifert aus Freiberg sind mit Carl Zeiss Jena in die Frauen-Bundesliga aufgestiegen. Eine Kickerin wird aber einen anderen Weg einschlagen. Nicole Woldmann aus Langenleuba-Oberhain und Johanna Seifert aus Freiberg sind mit Carl Zeiss Jena in die Frauen-Bundesliga aufgestiegen. Eine Kickerin schlägt aber einen anderen Weg ein. title: Drei ehemalige Frankfurter in Serbiens EM-Aufgebot
content: An Luka Jovic, Filip Kostic und Mijat Gacinovic erinnert man sich in Frankfurt gerne zurück. Das Trio steht im EM-Kader Serbiens. Im Aufgebot steht aber nur ein aktueller Bundesligaprofi. Mit Abwehrspieler Milos Veljkovic (28) von Werder Bremen hat es nur ein Bundesligalegionär ins EM-Aufgebot der serbischen Fußball-Nationalmannschaft geschafft. Im 26er-Kader von Nationaltrainer Dragan Stojkovic stehen aber auch drei Profis, die mehrere Jahre für gespielt haben. Luka Jovic (AC Mailand), Filip Kostic (Juventus Turin) und Mijat Gacinovic (AEK Athen) sollen mithelfen, dass die Serben in Gruppe C weiterkommen. Die Gegner sind am 16. Juni England, am 20. Juni und schließlich am 25. Juni . Aus dem Aufgebot ragt in der Offensive Dusan Vlahovic heraus. Der Stürmer von war in dieser Saison mit 16 Treffern hinter Lautaro Martinez (24) der zweitbeste Torjäger in der Serie A. (dpa) Der deutsche EM-Gruppengegner Ungarn vertraut einer deutschen Delegation. Im 26er Kader stehen sechs Profis aus der Bundesliga. title: Nations-League-Spiele in Düsseldorf, München und Freiburg
content: Beim DFB laufen schon die Planungen für die Zeit nach der EM. Der Fahrplan 2024 ist fix. Bundestrainer Julian Nagelsmann darf einmal vor der Haustür spielen. Kurz vor EM-Beginn hat der Deutsche Fußball-Bund den Fahrplan der Nationalmannschaft für die Zeit nach dem Heimturnier festgezurrt. Das erste Länderspiel der kommenden Saison bestreitet die DFB-Elf am 7. September in Düsseldorf gegen Ungarn. Es ist die erste von insgesamt sechs Partien in der Gruppenphase der Nations League bis November. Am 10. September steht das Auswärtsspiel in Amsterdam gegen die Niederlande an, wie der DFB am Dienstag mitteilte. Fortgesetzt wird der Wettbewerb für die Auswahl von Bundestrainer Julian Nagelsmann am 11. Oktober in Zenica gegen Bosnien-Herzegowina und drei Tage später, am 14. Oktober, mit dem Heimspiel gegen die Niederlande in München. Zum Jahresabschluss geht es am 16. November in Freiburg gegen Bosnien-Herzegowina und am 19. November in Budapest gegen Ungarn. Alle Partien werden um 20.45 Uhr angepfiffen. Noch in diesem Jahr sollen zudem die Qualifikationsgruppen für die WM 2026 ausgelost werden. Die Tickets für das Turnier in den USA, Kanada und Mexiko werden dann wie die Finalrunde in der Nations League 2025 ausgespielt. Bernd Neuendorf hat große Erwartungen an die Fußball-Nationalmannschaft. Der DFB-Präsident hält einen EM-Triumph am 14. Juli in Berlin für möglich. Das angekündigte Karriere-Ende von Toni Kroos hat Julian Nagelsmann nicht arg überrascht. Der Bundestrainer, DFB-Sportdirektor Völler und auch Verbandsboss Neuendorf äußern einen finalen Wunsch. title: Belgien mit drei Bundesliga-Profis zur EM - Courtois fehlt
content: Ein Leipziger und zwei Wolfsburger gehören zum EM-Aufgebot von Belgiens Coach Domenico Tedesco. Auch Axel Witsel ist zurück. Der Torwart von Real Madrid steht indes nicht im Kader. Mit drei Bundesliga-Profis gehen die belgische Fußball-Nationalmannschaft und ihr Trainer Domenico Tedesco in die Europameisterschaft in Deutschland in diesem Sommer. Neben Stürmer Lois Openda von gehören auch Torhüter Koen Casteels und Mittelfeldspieler Aster Vranckx, die beide beim VfL Wolfsburg unter Vertrag stehen, zum 25-köpfigen Aufgebot. Angeführt wird der Kader, den der belgische Verband am Dienstag veröffentlichte, vom früheren Wolfsburger und offensiven Topstar Kevin De Bruyne von City. Auch der ehemalige Dortmunder Defensivmann Axel Witsel, der inzwischen bei Atlético Madrid spielt, ist dabei. Der Routinier hat das bislang letzte seiner 130 Länderspiele bei der WM in im Dezember 2022 bestritten. Torhüter Thibaut Courtois vom Dortmunder Champions-League-Final-Gegner Real Madrid ist nach zwei schweren Knieverletzungen inzwischen wieder fit, gehört aber nicht zur Mannschaft. Vergangenen Juni hatte es einen Zwist zwischen Courtois und Trainer Tedesco gegeben. Belgien trifft in der Vorrunde der am 14. Juni beginnenden EM in der Gruppe E auf die , und die Ukraine. title: Die Schale fest im Griff - SC Magdeburg denkt schon weiter
content: Der dritte gesamtdeutsche Titel ist nur noch Formsache. Nun peilt der Weltpokalsieger Magdeburg nach dem DHB-Pokal die Titelverteidigung in der Königsklasse an - mehr geht nicht. An ein deutsches Handball-Wunder glaubt keiner mehr. Der hat die Meisterschale fest im Griff. Vor dem letzten Auswärtsspiel der Bördestädter am Donnerstag bei den Rhein Neckar Löwen (20.30 Uhr/Dyn) ist der Vorsprung von vier Punkten und 84 Toren auf die Füchse so groß, dass er nicht mehr einzuholen ist. Das sagen zumindest alle Experten. Und auch der sonst so besonnene und zurückhaltende SCM-Trainer Bennet Wiegert ließ sich nach dem knapp gewonnen Heimspiel am Sonntag gegen den SC DHfK dazu hinreißen, die Feierlichkeiten beginnen zu lassen. "Ich muss mal schauen, wie wir die Woche strukturieren und Seriosität reinbringen. Die Jungs sollen das jetzt erst einmal richtig genießen und feiern", sagte Wiegert der Magdeburger "Volksstimme". Der SC Magdeburg ist momentan das Nonplusultra in der Bundesliga, in und wohl auch in der ganzen Handballwelt. Der Club könnte nun etwas schaffen, das sehr selten ist: das Quadrupel. Den Weltpokal hat der Club in der Tasche, den DHB-Pokal auch, die Meisterschale bekommt er am Sonntag nach dem letzten Spiel gegen die HSG Wetzlar. Jetzt fehlt nur noch der Pott für den Champions League-Sieg. Im Final Four in am 8. Juni treffen die Magdeburger zunächst auf Aalborg AB und hoffen darauf, am 9. Juni den Titel verteidigen zu können. Einsatzzeiten für Bankdrücker? Deshalb kommt dem Team die frühe Meisterschaftsentscheidung sehr gelegen. "Wir können uns jetzt ganz auf die Champions League konzentrieren, haben keinen Druck mehr. Jetzt gehen wir all in, wollen alles", sagte Nationalspieler Lukas Mertens nach dem Leipzig-Spiel. Trainer Wiegert ist sich aber sicher, dass er und seine Kollegen auch die beiden letzten Bundesliga-Partien siegreich gestalten wollen. "Ich werde jetzt keinen Druck aufbauen. Aber wir wissen, dass die Jungs auch dieses Spiel gewinnen wollen", sagte der Erfolgscoach. Gut möglich, dass er seinen großen Stars wie Felix Claar, Omar Ingi Magnusson und Gisli Kristjansson eine Verschnaufpause gönnt und dafür ein paar Bankdrückern Zeit gibt, sich zu präsentieren. Denn auch dort steckt viel Potenzial: Welcher Trainer kann es sich schon leisten, Nationalspieler wie Philipp Weber oder Michael Damgaard kaum einzusetzen. Was passiert auf der Torhüterposition? Wiegert ist der Macher des SCM-Erfolgs. Stück für Stück hat er im Laufe der vergangenen Jahre sein Team zusammengestellt, gezielt Spieler verpflichtet, die von ihren Qualitäten und vor allem menschlich in sein Konzept passen. So kann er einen Handball spielen lassen, dem derzeit kaum ein Gegner gewachsen ist. Es ist eine Mannschaft, die sich auch von Rückschlägen nicht aus der Ruhe bringen lässt. Die Unruhe, die nach dem Dopingfall Nikola Portner im Umfeld entstand, überspielte die Mannschaft grandios, holte den DHB-Pokal und zog ins Champions League-Final-Four-Turnier ein. Sollte der Schweizer Torhüter tatsächlich gesperrt werden - seine Erklärfrist endet am 30. Mai - wird sich Wiegert genau überlegen, ob er Nationaltorhüter an die Elbe lotst. Der steht noch in Kielce unter Vertrag. Die Polen sollen dem Vernehmen nach 1,2 Millionen Euro Ablöse verlangen - eine Summe, die im Handball zumindest unüblich ist. Und sie würde etwa ein Zehntel des SCM-Etats bedeuten. Beim sehr sparsam und überlegt wirtschaftenden SC Magdeburg wird man genau rechnen. Aber vielleicht ergeben sich durch die Erfolge zusätzliche Einnahmequellen, die einen solchen Transfer ermöglichen. (dpa) Zwei Wahlkämpfer der Linken sind bei einer Wahlkampfaktion am Lindenauer Markt in Leipzig von einem Unbekannten angegriffen worden. Nach dem Derbysieg gegen Leipzig hat der SCM zwei Spieltage vor Schluss vier Punkte und 84 Tore Vorsprung auf die Füchse Berlin. title: Leons neuer Brunetti: Schatten eines fernen Krieges
content: Donna Leon lädt literarisch wieder nach Venedig ein: In Commissario Brunettis 33. Fall trifft man auf die altbekannten Figuren, aber trotzdem ist alles anders. Scharfzüngige Kommentare über Touristen, humorvolle Blicke auf das Menschliche und nachdenkliche Betrachtungen der Welt an sich: Pünktlich wie seit 33 Jahren legt Donna Leon ihr neues Buch über Commissario Brunetti in vor. Sie sind alle da: der seit gut 30 Jahren nicht alternde Brunetti, seine Frau Paola und die Kinder, der nervige Chef Patta, die kluge Kollegin Griffoni und die umtriebige Polizeiassistentin Elettra. Und doch ist "Feuerprobe" anders als frühere Bände. Es gibt eigentlich weder eine mysteriöse Leiche noch ein Verbrechen, das Brunetti aufklären soll. Donna Leon über den Inhalt "In diesem Buch geht es um mehrere Dinge: Was wir für die Vergangenheit halten, ist nicht unbedingt die Vergangenheit, die war", sagt Leon im Gespräch der Deutschen Presse-Agentur. "Es geht auch darum, was in einem Krieg passiert ist. Und um etwas, das zurückkommt, um dich zu verfolgen. Und es geht um "Baby-Gangs"." Gemeint sind Jugendbanden, die sich in den Straßen Venedigs aus Langeweile gegenseitig an die Kehle gehen. Ein Held und Abgründe Es beginnt alles mit einer Mutprobe unter zwei sogenannten Baby-Gangs, die auf dem Polizeirevier landen. Der Vater eines der Beteiligten war einst bekannt als Held, der Kameraden bei einem Einsatz im Irak-Krieg das Leben rettete. Er taucht zufällig in einem anderen Zusammenhang im Dunstkreis von Brunetti auf, und der beginnt, seine Vergangenheit zu beleuchten. "Schlichte Neugier", wie Signoria Elettra richtig feststellt. Seite 108, immer noch kein Verbrechen. Aber Brunetti entdeckt Abgründe, die ihn erschüttern. Die beiden Männer treffen am Ende des Buches auch noch in einem dramatischen Finale zusammen, bei dem es um Leben oder Tod geht. Viel Venedig, wenig Verbrechen Wer einen Krimi sucht, in dem sich alle Details später als Puzzleteile eines Kriminalfalls entpuppen, ist bei Brunettis 33. Fall fehl am Platz. Vieles bleibt einfach als Facette des Lebens in Venedig hängen. Eine reiche Amerikanerin spaziert durchs Bild, ein schmieriger Anwalt, der einer Polizistin Verführung eines Minderjährigen anhängen will, ein einsamer Kollege Brunettis, der Bronzestatuen sammelt und in Gefahr gerät. Die Fäden zum eigentlichen Fall sind denkbar dünn. Das sei Absicht, sagt Leon. Es spiegele die Veränderung der italienischen Gesellschaft wider. Kontinuität schwinde. "Die Italiener werden immer amerikanischer, große Individualisten." Aber die klug beobachteten und elegant beschriebenen Facetten des Lebens in Venedig sind ja genau das, was Donna-Leon-Fans so schätzen an den Brunetti-Büchern. "In meinen Büchern geht es eher um Menschen und ihre Gedanken", sagt Leon. "Die Atmosphäre, die Gespräche und die Interaktionen sind wichtiger als die Handlung." Krimi-Zutaten wie Grusel und Horror sind ohnehin nicht Donna Leons Metier. Brunetti als Donna Leons Alter Ego Da sinniert Brunetti nachdenklich über den Frühling, der ihm "das Gefühl oder die Hoffnung, dass wir noch eine Chance bekommen", gibt. Da wundert er sich, dass in "Männerköpfen zu wenig Platz ist für ein Nebeneinander von Liebe und Wut". Natürlich darf Brunettis Liebe zu den Klassikern nicht fehlen. Es sind dieses Mal die Memoiren des Marquis de Custine, die Leon selbst gerade zum zweiten Mal gelesen hat. In dieser Hinsicht sei Brunetti ihr Alter Ego, nicht seine ebenfalls belesene Frau Paola, sagt Leon: "Er liest, was ich lese. Er ist mitfühlender als sie, ich mag dieses Sanfte an ihm." Touristen und ihre iPhones Donna Leon (81) bringt hier und da auch die Moderne in die eigentlich zeitlose Brunetti-Serie, erwähnt Instagram und Speichern in der Cloud, aber dass sie selbst aus einer anderen Welt stammt, wird nicht nur an der Liebe zu den Klassikern deutlich. Zur Gemütslage der "Baby-Gangs" heißt es an einer Stelle: "Nichts Spannendes im Fernsehen, warum also nicht ein bisschen Randale" - als ob die jungen Leute noch Fernsehen schauten. Leon tuts nicht, wie sie sagt. Und natürlich bekommen die Touristen, die Leon aus Venedig vertrieben haben, wieder ihr Fett weg: "Boote vom Lido brachten Touristen, die sich auf ihren iPhones anschauten, wie Venedig aussah", ätzt Leon schon auf den ersten 25 Seiten. (dpa) Oschmann blickt auf seine Streitschrift, Renneberg romantisch nach Venedig und Dresden soll auch Privates erzählen: Das neue Jahresprogramm der Villa Esche startet im April und hat noch viel mehr auf Lager.
